translation.en: [Man] What's your name? Where are you from?
translation.zh: 你叫什么名字？来自哪里？

translation.en: Can I get your first name?
translation.zh: 请问你姓什么？

translation.en: Punched and kicked by anti-gay protesters in Moscow today.
translation.zh: 在莫斯科遭到反同者拳打脚踢

translation.en: [Peter] Someone, protect me. Someone, protect me.
translation.zh: 谁来保护我？

translation.en: Before being arrested by police.
translation.zh: 之后遭到警察逮捕

translation.en: Being the target of a violent attack comes with the territory.
translation.zh: 遭到暴力袭击是必然的

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, Peter Tatchell.
translation.zh: 各位先生女士 有请彼得塔切尔

translation.en: Stop homophobia in the Commonwealth!
translation.zh: 呼吁英联邦遏制恐同政策

translation.en: Peter Tatchell has devoted his life to crusading for homosexuals.
translation.zh: 彼得塔切尔倾其一生为同性恋平反

translation.en: [Peter] When people in power won't show compassion,
translation.zh: 位高权重者未释出同情心时

translation.en: sometimes you have to up the ante.
translation.zh: 我们偶尔要以身犯险

translation.en: He writes the book on how to do a protest.
translation.zh: 他写了一本举办抗议游行指南

translation.en: Peter is a performance artist.
translation.zh: 彼得是个演员

translation.en: I am trying to ensure the arrest of a torturer.
translation.zh: 我要确保这个暴君被逮捕归案

translation.en: He deserves recognition for his extraordinary contribution
translation.zh: 他的非凡贡献值得肯定

translation.en: to the happiness of millions who've never heard of him.
translation.zh: 因为他为数以百万未曾听说过他这个人的人谋求幸福

translation.en: The whole gay community owes you because of your bravery and your courage.
translation.zh: 同性恋群体欠你一个人情你勇敢无畏 勇气可嘉

translation.en: Gay activist Peter Tatchell refused to move on.
translation.zh: 同性恋社运人士彼得塔切尔拒绝离开

translation.en: - Leave. - No, we are not moving away.
translation.zh: -请你们离开-不要 我们是不会离开的

translation.en: Does Peter have an ego? Yes, you need an ego to perform.
translation.zh: -请你们离开-不要 我们是不会离开的 彼得是个自尊心重的人吗？人都需要自尊心才能表现吧

translation.en: - Can you shut up now, please? - I'm not going to shut up.
translation.zh: -你能不能闭嘴？-我是不会闭嘴的

translation.en: This is not a fair and open debate.
translation.zh: 这场辩论会既不公平 也不开明

translation.en: This is the most disliked man in Britain.
translation.zh: 他是英国最令人讨厌的人

translation.en: From the early days, I thought Peter was a brave motherfucker.
translation.zh: 起初我觉得彼得是个勇敢的狗杂种

translation.en: Let me be frank, I don't think Peter was always helping.
translation.zh: 我坦白地说我认为彼得的做法无济于事

translation.en: Let me finish. Let me finish. Let me finish. That really isn't true.
translation.zh: -先让我说完-不是这么回事

translation.en: The church for 2,000 years has been saying we're sick
translation.zh: 过去两千年以来教会一直谴责我们有病

translation.en: and sinful and immoral, and we're going to burn in hell.
translation.zh: 有罪、不道德死后会下地狱遭到烈火焚烧

translation.en: The Archbishop of Canterbury was interrupted today by a gay rights protest.
translation.zh: 坎特伯雷大主教今天证道时遭到一个同性恋平权示威者中断

translation.en: Dr Carey opposes lesbian and gay human rights.
translation.zh: 卡瑞博士支持歧视同性恋者

translation.en: He's a bullying kind of chap trying to get his own way.
translation.zh: 他只是个欺人太甚为达目的而不择手段的家伙

translation.en: Real men don't get insecure about gay men.
translation.zh: 真正的男人不会害怕男同性恋者

translation.en: Real men can cope and don't get scared by gay men.
translation.zh: 真正的男人能接受男同性恋者也不害怕男同性恋者

translation.en: Hey, Peter Tatchell, I'll see you again, you pussy.
translation.zh: 彼得塔切尔 我们会再见面的 臭娘炮

translation.en: What keeps me going is the knowledge that the homophobes
translation.zh: 得知那些反对我的恐同者要我放弃

translation.en: who are against me want me to give up.
translation.zh: 是推动我前进的动力

translation.en: Just like the Suffragettes or the black civil rights movement
translation.zh: 就像推动女性参政运动 或是美国黑人民权运动那样

translation.en: in America, we have to get a bit angry and confrontational.
translation.zh: 或是美国黑人民权运动那样 我们必须有点愤怒 必须与人对峙

translation.en: We've tried to play by the rules. It hasn't worked.
translation.zh: 我们试过按规则行事 结果行不通

translation.en: Now we're going to break the rules.
translation.zh: 如今只好打破陈规了

translation.en: [Producer] Cameras running.
translation.zh: -开始拍摄了-对焦速度

translation.en: Do you mind doing a hand clap
translation.zh: -开始拍摄了-对焦速度 你可以帮我走到两个麦克风之间拍个手吗？

translation.en: just in-between the two mics for me, just...?
translation.zh: 你可以帮我走到两个麦克风之间拍个手吗？

translation.en: Yep, that's perfect, thank you.
translation.zh: 没错 漂亮 谢谢

translation.en: OK, we're ready.
translation.zh: 好了 我们准备好了

translation.en: [Ian] 1952, Melbourne.
translation.zh: 1952年 墨尔本

translation.en: My family were working-class Pentecostal Evangelicals.
translation.zh: 我出生工人阶级家庭家人是五旬节教会教徒

translation.en: Ooh, lovely.
translation.zh: 有意思

translation.en: Pretty close to fundamentalist Christians.
translation.zh: 很接近原教旨基督教徒

translation.en: God has manifested his purpose.
translation.zh: 上帝已经彰显了祂的旨意

translation.en: It was a very puritanical form of religion,
translation.zh: 是一种非常看重清规戒律的宗教

translation.en: which put great store on the terrible sins
translation.zh: 严禁教徒搽口红喝酒、抽烟和骂脏话

translation.en: of wearing lipstick, drinking, smoking, swearing.
translation.zh: 这些行为被视为重罪

translation.en: In the day in which we live, where debauchery seems to be the norm,
translation.zh: 这年头 犯奸淫似乎成了常态

translation.en: where people are looking for sin and iniquity to abound...
translation.zh: 人们不断犯罪和做不道德的事

translation.en: In those days, they used to scream and shout and carry on.
translation.zh: 以前他们证道时会大喊大叫

translation.en: There is forgiveness for sin, though your sins be as scarlet.
translation.zh: 罪得以赦免只是犯下的罪将成为一个印记…

translation.en: It was all fire and brimstone and "You're going to hell",
translation.zh: 内容离不开地狱之火和硫黄石他们会说：“你们一定会下地狱”

translation.en: and I look at my brother, Peter, and I think, yeah,
translation.zh: 我转头望向我哥哥彼得 心想：“他比任何宗教领袖更像基督吧”

translation.en: he's more Christlike than so many of these religious...please.
translation.zh: 心想：“他比任何宗教领袖更像基督吧”

translation.en: It's a fight against the devil, really.
translation.zh: 这是在跟魔鬼抗争

translation.en: That's...
translation.zh: 这是…

translation.en: Well, that's what evil is, of course, isn't it?
translation.zh: 这就是恶魔的样子 不是吗？

translation.en: It's the devil in people.
translation.zh: 恶魔在人的心里

translation.en: My name is Mari, and I'm Peter's mother.
translation.zh: 我叫玛蒂 我是彼得的妈妈

translation.en: Unfortunately, she's been brainwashed by the church
translation.zh: 不幸的是 她已经被教会洗脑了

translation.en: to think homosexuals are going to hell.
translation.zh: 认为同性恋者一定会下地狱

translation.en: I mean, good deeds don't save us.
translation.zh: 行善不会使人得救

translation.en: That's one thing that the Bible does teach.
translation.zh: 这是《圣经》的教导

translation.en: Good deeds are not going to get us to heaven.
translation.zh: 行善是无法让人上天堂的

translation.en: This is my mother in 1946, aged 18.
translation.zh: 这是我妈妈1946年的样子那年她18岁

translation.en: [Peter] All throughout my childhood,
translation.zh: 在我整个童年期间

translation.en: my mother suffered from life-threatening asthma.
translation.zh: 我妈妈倍受哮喘病折磨

translation.en: I basically had to look after
translation.zh: 我必须照顾

translation.en: my younger half-brother and two half-sisters.
translation.zh: 一个同母异父的弟弟和两个妹妹

translation.en: He was like my second mum.
translation.zh: 他就像我第二个妈妈

translation.en: He would just do things for me like get a bottle and
translation.zh: 他会为我做很多事 像帮我泡奶 帮我穿鞋、挑选我要穿的衣服

translation.en: put my shoes on, pick out the clothes he'd like me to wear.
translation.zh: 帮我穿鞋、挑选我要穿的衣服

translation.en: Send the next one through, next one through!
translation.zh: 下一轮准备好！

translation.en: I was regarded as a rebel at school.
translation.zh: 我在学校被视为反叛者

translation.en: They didn't always agree with my politics.
translation.zh: 我的政治观经常不受到认可

translation.en: I thought people should have input
translation.zh: 我认为某些政治观

translation.en: into the way the school was run.
translation.zh: 应该被纳入学校的操作系统中

translation.en: We ensured that the system of appointing house captains and prefects was made by the pupils,
translation.zh: 确保社长和班长是由学生选出的

translation.en: not the staff and the headmaster.
translation.zh: 而不是由教职员和校长选出的

translation.en: This was grassroots democracy in the classroom.
translation.zh: 这就是所谓的“草根民主教室” （1968年 各班班长）

translation.en: A lot of the boys used to joke that I was gay.
translation.zh: （以解决全球议题而为人所知） 以前很多男生会开玩笑地说我是男同性恋

translation.en: At the time, I didn't realise I was gay.
translation.zh: 以前很多男生会开玩笑地说我是男同性恋 当时我并没意识到自己是男同性恋我以前是直男 交过好几个女朋友

translation.en: I thought I was straight. I had girlfriends.
translation.zh: 当时我并没意识到自己是男同性恋我以前是直男 交过好几个女朋友

translation.en: It was quite a thing to be voted head boy, given that I was very radical left-wing,
translation.zh: 获选为班长挺厉害的毕竟是个非常极端的左翼分子

translation.en: and, according to some guys, gay.
translation.zh: 也就是某些人所谓的“男同性恋者”

translation.en: When my mother remarried... - Did she divorce? - Yeah, yeah.
translation.zh: -我妈妈后来再婚了-她离过婚吗？

translation.en: That must've been a shock to the church.
translation.zh: -教会一定很震惊吧-是啊

translation.en: - It was. - Oh...
translation.zh: -教会一定很震惊吧-是啊 天啊

translation.en: My stepfather, Edwin,
translation.zh: 我的继父埃德温

translation.en: he was an extremely harsh and even cruel, I'd say...
translation.zh: 他非常严格 甚至称得上“残暴”

translation.en: Member of the church?
translation.zh: 他也是教徒吗？

translation.en: Yeah, but not very Christian
translation.zh: 他是教徒但他对待我和妈妈的态度

translation.en: in his own behaviour towards my mother or myself.
translation.zh: 他是教徒但他对待我和妈妈的态度 几乎不像个基督徒

translation.en: His belief was that, quote, children should pay their way,
translation.zh: 他相信孩子必须经历痛苦才会成长

translation.en: so, with great reluctance, I left school at the end of 1968.
translation.zh: 于是在1968年我很不情愿地离开了学校

translation.en: Then, when I went to work in a department store,
translation.zh: 后来我开始到百货公司上班

translation.en: I met for the first time openly gay people about my own age
translation.zh: 我第一次接触到公开出柜、跟我同龄的男同性恋者

translation.en: who were, you know, handsome, creative, talented.
translation.zh: 他们外貌英俊、创意非凡、才华横溢

translation.en: Up until that time, I always thought a gay man
translation.zh: 在那之前 我一直以为男同性恋者

translation.en: was some dirty old geezer who molested young boys.
translation.zh: 就是邋邋遢遢、非礼男童的老爷爷

translation.en: I never conceived of the idea that a gay person could be someone like me.
translation.zh: 从没想过男同性恋者也可能是像我这种人

translation.en: One of my co-workers used to invite me home for dinner every night as a joke, sort of.
translation.zh: 有个男同事经常打趣地说要邀请我去他家共进晚餐

translation.en: One night, when he asked me, I said yes.
translation.zh: 后来某个晚上他邀请我去他家共进晚餐 我答应了

translation.en: He had a little bedsit flat overlooking Port Phillip Bay,
translation.zh: 他住在一间小型公寓里能俯瞰菲利普港湾

translation.en: we had a very romantic dinner at the window,
translation.zh: 我们在窗户旁边享用浪漫极致的晚餐

translation.en: looking at the dolphins diving in and out of the water,
translation.zh: 边看海豚在海水上蹦蹦跳跳

translation.en: and then, afterwards, we had sex,
translation.zh: 晚餐过后 我们做爱

translation.en: and it was a great experience,
translation.zh: 那是一段美好的经历

translation.en: and I remember lying back on the bed and thinking to myself,
translation.zh: 我记得躺在床上想

translation.en: "If this is what gay is, then I'm definitely gay."
translation.zh: “如果这就是男同性恋者那我绝对是其中一个”

translation.en: My parents were such zealous Christians
translation.zh: 我父母是非常虔诚的基督徒

translation.en: that I initially dared not tell them I was gay.
translation.zh: 我起初并不敢告诉他们我出柜了

translation.en: I feared they might report me to the police.
translation.zh: 我担心他们会报警

translation.en: Please welcome Mardi Nitscke.
translation.zh: 有请玛蒂尼斯克

translation.en: Peter says that, over a period of two to three years,
translation.zh: 彼得说 过去两三年以来

translation.en: he was hinting towards the effect that he was homosexual.
translation.zh: 他不断暗示你说他是男同性恋者

translation.en: Like any other mother, you know,
translation.zh: 跟所有母亲一样

translation.en: you hope that your son or your daughter is not homosexual.
translation.zh: 我们都希望儿女不是同性恋者

translation.en: What did being homosexual mean to you?
translation.zh: 同性恋对你来说意味着什么？

translation.en: Well, for one thing, it's against my Christian beliefs.
translation.zh: 首先 同性恋违反了我的基督信仰

translation.en: Was it still a crime, though, in Australia when you came out?
translation.zh: 你在澳洲出柜时同性恋是不是违法行为？

translation.en: At that time, homosexuality was still punishable
translation.zh: 那个年代同性恋者会被判好几年监禁

translation.en: by several years imprisonment... - Goodness.
translation.zh: 那个年代同性恋者会被判好几年监禁 天啊

translation.en: And possible forcible psychiatric treatment, as well.
translation.zh: 还可能要进行强制性心理治疗

translation.en: Where did your sense of injustice
translation.zh: 我想知道你对同性恋者的正义感

translation.en: and the possibility of putting it right come from?
translation.zh: 以及为同性恋者争取权益的想法从何而来？

translation.en: When I was aged 11.
translation.zh: 11岁那年

translation.en: I heard about the bombing by white racists
translation.zh: 我听说阿拉巴马州伯明翰市发生了一起黑人教堂

translation.en: of a black church in Birmingham, Alabama.
translation.zh: 遭到白人种族主义者炸弹袭击的事件

translation.en: Four young girls, about my own age, were murdered.
translation.zh: 四个年龄与我相仿的少女惨遭不测

translation.en: I remember thinking to myself, "How could anyone
translation.zh: 我记得自己当时在想 “为什么有人要杀害四个星期天早上去教堂的少女？”

translation.en: "kill four young girls in church on a Sunday morning?"
translation.zh: “为什么有人要杀害四个星期天早上去教堂的少女？”

translation.en: That prompted my interest and support for the black civil rights movement.
translation.zh: 这起事件让我成为了黑人民权运动的支持者

translation.en: We need an organisation
translation.zh: 我们需要一个做好准备愿意采取行动的组织

translation.en: that's ready and willing to take action.
translation.zh: 我们需要一个做好准备愿意采取行动的组织 （1964年 纽约 马尔科姆艾克斯）

translation.en: Later, I adapted their ideals, values and methods
translation.zh: 我开始将他们的想法、价值观和操作

translation.en: to my own human rights work.
translation.zh: 运用在我发起的人权运动上

translation.en: Any kind of action, not when the men downtown see fit
translation.zh: 不是在城市人认为适合的时候才采取行动

translation.en: but when we see fit, by any means necessary.
translation.zh: 而是在我们认为适合的时候就要不顾一切地采取行动

translation.en: I looked at the experience of the black civil rights movement,
translation.zh: 我参考黑人民权运动的历史

translation.en: and calculated that it would probably take about 50 years to win LGBT+ rights
translation.zh: 估算性少数群体平权运动很可能要持续约五十年

translation.en: in countries like Australia, the United States and Britain.
translation.zh: 才能在澳洲、美国和英国等国家取胜

translation.en: From the age of 15 onwards, I began campaigning
translation.zh: 从15岁起 我开始游行示威

translation.en: against Australia and America's involvement in the Vietnam War.
translation.zh: 反对澳洲和美国参与越南战争

translation.en: Our goal was to build a huge protest that would show the Australian government
translation.zh: 目的是建立广大的抗议群众让澳洲政府意识到

translation.en: that they no longer had the support of the people.
translation.zh: 他们已经失去民心了

translation.en: This barrel will continue to hold the immediate future for all young Australians
translation.zh: 这个箱子持续掌控着跟所有澳洲青年人的未来命脉

translation.en: to recruit training before they're drafted
translation.zh: 他们将决定要不要接受军训

translation.en: to regular army unit to complete their two-year service.
translation.zh: 然后被召入常规部队服役两年

translation.en: My name's Helen Hill.
translation.zh: 我叫海伦希尔

translation.en: I met Peter at one of the regular demonstrations held at the General Post Office.
translation.zh: 我们是在邮政总局参加例常示威行动时认识的

translation.en: Peter was one of the keen members to urge young men
translation.zh: 彼得是其中一个呼吁某个年轻阶层的年轻人

translation.en: of a particular age group not to register for national service.
translation.zh: 拒绝入伍的成员

translation.en: That was a serious criminal offence
translation.zh: 这种行为严重违法

translation.en: tantamount to incitement, sedition and mutiny.
translation.zh: 相等于煽动罪、扰乱治安罪和叛国罪 （世纪报）

translation.en: [Helen] There was a demonstration outside the US Embassy on the 4th of July
translation.zh: 7月4日美国大使馆外面爆发示威游行

translation.en: against the continuation of the Vietnam War.
translation.zh: 反对越南战争持续升级

translation.en: When we got there, the road was blockaded by mounted police.
translation.zh: 抵达现场时 马路被骑警封锁

translation.en: We sat down, and then we were subjected
translation.zh: 于是我们坐在地上接着就受到手持警棍的骑警

translation.en: to a very violent mounted horseback charge with batons.
translation.zh: 于是我们坐在地上接着就受到手持警棍的骑警 非常暴力的对待

translation.en: I was very, very afraid.
translation.zh: 我当时感到非常害怕

translation.en: People's heads were being smashed and split.
translation.zh: 看到有人的脑袋被打得皮开肉绽

translation.en: Once they saw police horses driving into the crowd, they would run away.
translation.zh: 示威群众看到骑警冲向人群后就开始四处逃窜

translation.en: But then there were others, such as Peter, who would maintain their position.
translation.zh: 但有其他像彼得这种人坚守现场 毫不动摇

translation.en: Did you like the idea of being the rebel?
translation.zh: 你是不是一个喜欢不按理出牌的人？

translation.en: Well, I felt a satisfaction
translation.zh: 我从坚持做自己认为正确的事中

translation.en: that I was doing what I believed to be right.
translation.zh: 得到满足感

translation.en: The Vietnam Moratorium protests of 1970
translation.zh: （终结越战马上把孩子们送回来！） 1970年爆发的终止越战游行

translation.en: were the turning point of public opinion against the war.
translation.zh: 改变了民众对战争的看法

translation.en: Ironic, isn't it,
translation.zh: （他是危险人物） 很讽刺 对吧？

translation.en: that, if you want to demonstrate for peace,
translation.zh: 为和平起义

translation.en: you also have to employ some of the traditional qualities of war.
translation.zh: 竟要带着上战场作战的必要精神？

translation.en: It taught me how you can mobilise people.
translation.zh: 这场示威运动让我学会了如何动员民众

translation.en: Get media coverage.
translation.zh: 获得媒体报道

translation.en: Put people in power under pressure,
translation.zh: 向当权者施压

translation.en: and persuade public opinion to change.
translation.zh: 敦促民众改变观念

translation.en: When did you leave Australia?
translation.zh: 为什么当初要离开澳洲？

translation.en: I left in 1971.
translation.zh: 我在1971年离开澳洲

translation.en: If I'd stayed in Australia, I would've been required by law
translation.zh: 如果继续留在澳洲 按照法律 我就会被召入伍 参与越战

translation.en: to register for the draft for Vietnam.
translation.zh: 按照法律 我就会被召入伍 参与越战

translation.en: And I had a conscious objection to that war.
translation.zh: 我很有意识地反对越战

translation.en: I believed it was immoral, unjust. I didn't want to be a part of it.
translation.zh: 我认为越战是不道德、不公义的行为我坚持不参战

translation.en: Leaving Australia was quite a wrench.
translation.zh: 离开澳洲并不容易

translation.en: It was a leap in the dark. In the end, I settled in London,
translation.zh: 就像在暗中摸索最后 我在伦敦定居下来

translation.en: got a good job, made lots of new friends.
translation.zh: 找到了一份好工作 认识了很多朋友

translation.en: - And how old were you then? - Nineteen.
translation.zh: -那年你几岁？-19岁

translation.en: So, still not legally able to have sex,
translation.zh: 这个年龄在英国仍不能合法性交

translation.en: even consenting sex, in the UK.
translation.zh: 即便是在双方知情同意下

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Still a crime. - You had to be 21, didn't you? Yeah.
translation.zh: -仍属违法行为-要到21岁才能性交 对吧？

translation.en: When I'd first come to London and first met Peter Tatchell,
translation.zh: 第一次来到伦敦 见到彼得塔切尔时

translation.en: if two men kissed in the street,
translation.zh: 那个时候 要是两个男人在街上接吻足以被警察逮捕归案

translation.en: it was an arrestable offence, it was an act of gross indecency.
translation.zh: 那个时候 要是两个男人在街上接吻足以被警察逮捕归案 属于严重猥亵罪

translation.en: You could actually get a jail term for it.
translation.zh: 很有可能被判入狱

translation.en: My name's Tom Robinson.
translation.zh: 我叫汤姆罗宾逊

translation.en: I had a spell of fame in '78
translation.zh: 1978年 一度红极一时

translation.en: with a song called 'Sing if You're Glad to be Gay'.
translation.zh: 因为我有一首歌叫《为男同性恋者的快乐而唱》

translation.en: ♪ Sing if you're glad to be gay ♪
translation.zh: 为男同性恋者的快乐而唱

translation.en: ♪ Sing if you're happy that way hey ♪
translation.zh: 为男同性恋者的幸福而唱

translation.en: ♪ Sing if you're glad to be gay ♪
translation.zh: 为男同性恋者的快乐而唱

translation.en: ♪ Sing if you're happy that way ♪
translation.zh: 为男同性恋者的幸福而唱

translation.en: One more time.
translation.zh: 再来一次

translation.en: London was an amazing place for a young queer man to arrive.
translation.zh: 伦敦是个非常适合年轻酷儿逗留的好地方

translation.en: The gay liberation movement had just kicked off.
translation.zh: 当时同性恋者解放运动刚刚引爆

translation.en: The second day I was here in London, I saw a sticker advertising
translation.zh: 我抵达伦敦的第二天 看到一张贴纸

translation.en: the meetings of the newly formed Gay Liberation Front.
translation.zh: 在呼吁人们出席同性恋解放阵线的集会

translation.en: - On your second day. - Yes, yes!
translation.zh: -抵达第二天-是的

translation.en: - The second day.
translation.zh: 抵达第二天

translation.en: So, five days later, I was at my first meeting,
translation.zh: 五天后 我出席了第一场集会

translation.en: and, a month later, I was helping to organise
translation.zh: 一个月后我开始协助同性恋解放阵线

translation.en: lots of the Gay Liberation Front's spectacular street protests.
translation.zh: 主办许多场街头示威活动

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, you are looking at a roaring lesbian.
translation.zh: 各位先生女士 你们眼前的我是一个正在咆哮的女同性恋者

translation.en: I am one of those people, a pervert, according to society.
translation.zh: 我就是被社会定义为色情狂的人

translation.en: [Angela] I remember Peter appeared from Australia,
translation.zh: 我记得来自澳洲的彼得出场的情景

translation.en: and he had lovely, dark, curly hair.
translation.zh: 他一头漂亮的黑色卷发

translation.en: We thought he was a rather lovely young man.
translation.zh: 我们觉得他是个非常亲切的年轻人

translation.en: My name's Angela Mason,
translation.zh: 我叫安琪拉梅森

translation.en: and I've been involved in gay liberation movements for over 50 years.
translation.zh: 过去五十年以来我一直积极参与同性恋解放运动

translation.en: The Gay Liberation Front
translation.zh: 同性恋解放阵线

translation.en: actually developed from what was happening in America.
translation.zh: 其实是一个源自美国的运动

translation.en: [Voiceover] In the summer of 1969,
translation.zh: （同性恋窝巢遭突击母蜂疯狂蜇咬） 1969年夏天

translation.en: police violently raided the Stonewall Inn in New York City.
translation.zh: 警察以暴力的手段突击位于纽约市的石墙酒吧

translation.en: Police raids on gay bars were common,
translation.zh: 警方突击同性恋酒吧不是新鲜事

translation.en: but, this time, the LGBTQ patrons
translation.zh: 只是这次事件中跨性别消费者和路人群起反抗

translation.en: and passers-by fought back, sparking days of rioting.
translation.zh: 只是这次事件中跨性别消费者和路人群起反抗 这场暴动非常具有标志性

translation.en: In Stonewall, the riots are now so iconic
translation.zh: 这场暴动非常具有标志性

translation.en: that everyone assumes that we all knew about it when it was happening,
translation.zh: 事发时 每个人都以为大家都知情

translation.en: and that immediately things sprang into action,
translation.zh: 结果事情一发不可收拾

translation.en: but did you have a direct relationship with the Stonewall riots?
translation.zh: 我想知道你和这场暴动有直接关系吗？

translation.en: I did hear about a subsequent protest
translation.zh: 我的确听说过事发两三个月后

translation.en: two or three months later, a gay rights march in New York.
translation.zh: 纽约接连发生同性恋平权示威游行

translation.en: And when I read that,
translation.zh: 我读到这些新闻后

translation.en: I thought to myself, "Wow, this is what I want to be part of."
translation.zh: 我心想：“天啊 我要参加”

translation.en: When we walked up 6th Avenue, and we said, "Join us,"
translation.zh: 边走上第六大道边喊：“加入我们！”

translation.en: we didn't know that the world would join us and be proud.
translation.zh: 我不知道全世界会响应这个号召并且为此感到骄傲

translation.en: The next meeting is January.
translation.zh: 同性恋解放阵线下一场集会将会在来临1月

translation.en: The following meeting will be at the LSC as usual.
translation.zh: 下一场集会地点照旧也就是在伦敦经济学院

translation.en: The Gay Liberation Front developed
translation.zh: 同性恋解放阵线吸引了

translation.en: from hundreds and hundreds of people coming together.
translation.zh: 数以千计的人聚首

translation.en: Peter was always part of the events that were going on.
translation.zh: 场场活动都可以看到彼得的身影

translation.en: The Gay Liberation Front
translation.zh: 加入同性恋解放阵线是个充满喜悦和乐趣的体验

translation.en: was a completely joyful, fun, anarchic, radical experience.
translation.zh: 加入同性恋解放阵线是个充满喜悦和乐趣的体验 自由自在、超凡脱俗 （在屁眼上安装一盏灯看书）

translation.en: There was humour involved in it.
translation.zh: 少不了幽默

translation.en: We're here, we're queer, get used to it,
translation.zh: “酷儿在此 好好习惯我们的存在”

translation.en: rather than - would you please accept us?
translation.zh: 而不是“你们可以接纳我们吗？”

translation.en: A lot of the politics of gay liberation weren't, in a sense, traditional politics.
translation.zh: 同性恋解放阵线的政治理念与传统上的政治理念不同

translation.en: They were challenging in quite a witty way cultural stereotypes.
translation.zh: 他们的政治观旨在以风趣的方式挑战文化刻板印象

translation.en: Personally, it means to me a liberation of my own life.
translation.zh: 对我而言 这是对自己生命的解放

translation.en: Before GLF, I was incredibly... I was really leading a double life.
translation.zh: 加入同性恋解放阵线前我过着双重人生

translation.en: The great thing about the Gay Liberation Front
translation.zh: 同性恋解放阵线的好处

translation.en: was that it provided you with alternative role models.
translation.zh: 是让人看到其他人物楷模

translation.en: Culturally, there were really only camp gay men visible,
translation.zh: 通常人们只看到妖娆张扬的男同性恋者

translation.en: and no lesbians that I can recall.
translation.zh: 我不记得看过女同性恋者

translation.en: You'd get people like Kenneth Williams being very, very funny.
translation.zh: 我们有像肯尼斯威廉姆斯这种风趣幽默的人物

translation.en: It raises the problem of sex.
translation.zh: 这足以引发性方面的问题

translation.en: I assure you, matron,
translation.zh: 这位女士 我敢保证

translation.en: I wouldn't dream of bothering you in that way.
translation.zh: 我做梦都不会想要对你做那种事

translation.en: John Inman in 'Are You Being Served?'
translation.zh: 《百货店奇遇记》中的约翰尹曼

translation.en: I bet you met a lot of nice girls that way.
translation.zh: 我猜你肯定是遇到不少可爱的女生了

translation.en: I did.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Not to mention a roving reporter, a trendy bishop,
translation.zh: 包括一个到处旅行的记者一个时尚的主教

translation.en: a stringvestite and a dustman with a very interesting tale to tell.
translation.zh: 一个阴阳怪气的人还有一个来历非常有趣的清洁工人

translation.en: When I was 20,
translation.zh: 我20岁那年

translation.en: it was the first time I came across the word 'homosexual' in a book,
translation.zh: 第一次从书中看到“同性恋”这个词

translation.en: and therefore I was unable to form any meaningful
translation.zh: 从此再也无法 与人建立起任何有意义的情感关系与人建立情感是我所渴望的事

translation.en: emotional relationship of a kind which I longed for.
translation.zh: 与人建立起任何有意义的情感关系与人建立情感是我所渴望的事

translation.en: I was unable to talk to anybody about what I felt
translation.zh: 我无法跟人倾诉我的感受

translation.en: because I was ashamed of it.
translation.zh: 因为我感到羞愧

translation.en: The predominant view was that gay was sad and shameful.
translation.zh: 人们大致上认为身为同性恋者是悲哀且可耻的

translation.en: So, we wanted to develop an idea to counter that.
translation.zh: 为了对抗这种负面想法我们要发展出一个理念

translation.en: We organised the UK's first ever gay pride parade in July 1972.
translation.zh: 在1972年 我们举办了英国史无前例的同性恋骄傲大游行

translation.en: Even many LGBT+ people felt it was a bad idea,
translation.zh: 当时有不少性少数群体对这项运动表示不赞同

translation.en: drawing unnecessary attention to us.
translation.zh: 认为此举为我们引来不必要的目光

translation.en: I never saw the LGBT+ freedom struggle as purely a national one.
translation.zh: 我从不把性少数群体对自由的挣扎视为一个国家的事

translation.en: I always saw it as global.
translation.zh: 我一直认为是全世界的事

translation.en: Gay pride would be a way
translation.zh: 同性恋骄傲大游行

translation.en: of helping overcome internalised homophobia.
translation.zh: 能帮助人们克服深植于心的恐同心态

translation.en: We would help change the consciousness
translation.zh: 我们要推动酷儿群体在意识上的改变

translation.en: of the queer community.
translation.zh: 我们要推动酷儿群体在意识上的改变 我们绝对不会对警察的镇压妥协！

translation.en: As well as asserting our dignity and rights before the straight majority.
translation.zh: 为酷儿群体争取比异性恋者更大的尊严和权益

translation.en: I've been on every single London pride parade since.
translation.zh: 每场伦敦同性恋骄傲大游行我都有份参与

translation.en: We must never forget the rights of LGBT+ people
translation.zh: 我们也要记得为身在非洲、亚洲拉丁美洲等地的性少数群体争取权益

translation.en: in Africa, Asia, Latin America, and so, when I heard about
translation.zh: 我们也要记得为身在非洲、亚洲拉丁美洲等地的性少数群体争取权益 因此 当我听说世界青年联欢节

translation.en: the World Festival of Youth and Students being held
translation.zh: 因此 当我听说世界青年联欢节

translation.en: in communist East Berlin in 1973, I thought this is a chance
translation.zh: 将在1973年于共产党统治的东柏林举行时 我心想：“这是将同性恋解放阵线的理念

translation.en: to take the gay liberation message to all these countries.
translation.zh: 我心想：“这是将同性恋解放阵线的理念 输入这些国家的大好机会”

translation.en: I was 21 at the time,
translation.zh: 那一年 我21岁

translation.en: and the idea of going to stage
translation.zh: 想到要走上台

translation.en: what turned out to be the first ever gay rights protest
translation.zh: 在一个共产党统治的国家

translation.en: in a communist country, that was scary.
translation.zh: 举办第一次同性恋平权示威活动难免心惊胆颤

translation.en: There's a strength, people would call it bravery, wouldn't they, or foolhardiness.
translation.zh: 有一种力量人们称之为勇气 要不就是有勇无谋

translation.en: That's foolhardiness.
translation.zh: 有勇无谋

translation.en: Many people came up to me,
translation.zh: 很多人跑来找我

translation.en: and I secretly passed them leaflets I'd stuffed in my rucksack.
translation.zh: 我悄悄把背包里的传单递给他们

translation.en: Those leaflets went back to countries
translation.zh: （同性恋者感到愤怒） 这些传单最后传遍各国

translation.en: like Romania, Bulgaria, Hungary and Czechoslovakia.
translation.zh: 例如罗马尼亚、保加利亚匈牙利和捷克斯洛伐克 （同性恋是愤怒）

translation.en: They were passed around in underground circles
translation.zh: 在地下圈子里传来传去

translation.en: for years and years afterwards.
translation.zh: 年复一年不间断

translation.en: That protest during the festival did prompt the beginnings
translation.zh: 在世界青年联欢节上举办的那场示威活动确实点燃了

translation.en: of a new LGBT+ movement in those communist countries.
translation.zh: 这些共产国的性少数群体平权运动

translation.en: I'm Stephen Fry. Like most people, I first heard of Peter Tatchell
translation.zh: 我是斯蒂芬弗莱跟大多数人一样 我听说彼得塔切尔

translation.en: because of the Bermondsey by-election.
translation.zh: 是因为伯蒙德赛补选

translation.en: The story really began locally
translation.zh: 在英国 整个故事的起点

translation.en: when Bermondsey Labour Party first selected Peter Tatchell.
translation.zh: 是在伯蒙德赛当年工党派出彼得塔切尔出战该选区

translation.en: Bermondsey lies south of Tower Bridge alongside the Thames.
translation.zh: 伯蒙德赛坐落在伦敦塔桥南部与泰晤士河毗邻

translation.en: It has long been a Labour stronghold.
translation.zh: 一直以来都是工党的不败之地

translation.en: We don't want someone there
translation.zh: 一直以来都是工党的不败之地 我们都不希望选出一个闷不吭声的议员

translation.en: who's gonna have their lips shut and say nothing,
translation.zh: 我们都不希望选出一个闷不吭声的议员

translation.en: we want someone who's gonna fight hard for local people.
translation.zh: 而是希望选出一个愿意为当地人争取权益的议员

translation.en: You can guarantee I'm gonna do that, can't ya?
translation.zh: 你可以肯定我就会后者 不是吗？

translation.en: Yeah. That's very nice.
translation.zh: 是的 太好了

translation.en: The fact that he was a gay candidate
translation.zh: 他是个同性恋候选人

translation.en: should've been something to be celebrated and admired,
translation.zh: 应该受到爱戴和敬仰才对

translation.en: but it was made into a huge millstone around his neck.
translation.zh: 结果参选却成了他一大负担

translation.en: Can I rely on your support for Labour?
translation.zh: 你会支持我们吗？

translation.en: One way we went out of gay liberation was into public life.
translation.zh: 走入公众视野是同性恋解放阵线的目标之一

translation.en: Lots of people who worked for local authorities became councillors.
translation.zh: 不少在道地执法单位上班的人后来当上了议员

translation.en: Peter saw the Labour Party as an opportunity
translation.zh: 彼得将加入工党视为一个大好机会

translation.en: to achieve major democratic socialist advance.
translation.zh: 协助同性恋者向民主社会迈出一大步

translation.en: It was a battle.
translation.zh: 那是一场硬战

translation.en: A left-wing militant was picked last night to fight in the next election.
translation.zh: 昨晚决定派出一名左翼激进分子出战下一场选举

translation.en: I'm very confident that I will stop
translation.zh: 我有信心能阻止保守党增加房租

translation.en: the Tory rent increases, demand jobs for the unemployed,
translation.zh: 我有信心能阻止保守党增加房租 致力于增加工作机会这是每个人都认同的

translation.en: which everybody in the Labour Party agrees with.
translation.zh: 致力于增加工作机会这是每个人都认同的

translation.en: At the beginning of the election, he was well in front on the opinion polls.
translation.zh: 选举初期民意调查显示他的呼声最高

translation.en: All these office blocks, who's putting a stop to them? Labour.
translation.zh: 不断兴建办公大楼只有工党能阻止这个趋势

translation.en: I'm Chris Smith.
translation.zh: 我是克里斯史密斯

translation.en: I was the first openly gay cabinet minister anywhere in the world.
translation.zh: 我是全球第一个公开出柜的内阁部长

translation.en: Can I rely on your support for Labour in the election on the 24th?
translation.zh: 你会选举中支持工党吗？

translation.en: May do.
translation.zh: 好啊

translation.en: During the run-up to the Bermondsey by-election,
translation.zh: 伯蒙德赛补选竞选期间

translation.en: Peter was subject to all sorts of horrible viciousness.
translation.zh: 彼得受到各种形式的攻击

translation.en: Peter Tatchell's homosexuality
translation.zh: （星期四投票给工党） 彼得塔切尔的同性恋身份

translation.en: was ridiculed by his opponents and by some on his own side.
translation.zh: 遭到竞争对手甚至是党内人士的揶揄 （塔切尔是个共产主义的娘炮）

translation.en: ♪ Tatchell is a puppet as pretty as can be ♪
translation.zh: 塔切尔只是一个漂亮的傀儡

translation.en: ♪ But he must be slow if he don't know ♪
translation.zh: 他肯定是个后知后觉的人只是他没意识到

translation.en: ♪ He can't beat our MP ♪
translation.zh: 不能让他成为我们的国会议员

translation.en: Tatchell is receiving constant death threats,
translation.zh: 塔切尔不断接获死亡恐吓

translation.en: and needs police protection.
translation.zh: 急需警方提供庇护

translation.en: Two bullets sent to me.
translation.zh: 我收到两颗子弹

translation.en: I had three attempts to run me down in the car.
translation.zh: 有三次差点被车撞倒的经历

translation.en: This letter here is pretty typical.
translation.zh: 这是非常典型的恐吓信

translation.en: At the age of 64 with a heart complaint, and therefore with little to lose,
translation.zh: “我是一个有心脏疾病的64岁老人没什么好失去的

translation.en: I will be prepared to go to prison for the murder of this creep.
translation.zh: 我已经准备好干掉这个家伙然后去坐牢了”

translation.en: The dirtiest election campaign in British history.
translation.zh: 这是英国历史上最肮脏的选举

translation.en: If you want to win an election, you don't run around with homosexuality as an issue.
translation.zh: 想要赢得选举就不能打着同性恋的旗号到处张扬

translation.en: It's rubbish.
translation.zh: 这是扯淡！

translation.en: The scale of hatred and violence
translation.zh: 人们对我的憎恶和暴力

translation.en: seemed to coincide with the tabloid campaign.
translation.zh: 似乎与小报新闻息息相关

translation.en: The real damage wasn't done
translation.zh: （谎言、抹黑与彼得塔切尔） 真正的破坏并非来自单单一篇文章

translation.en: so much by any individual article as by the non-stop
translation.zh: 真正的破坏并非来自单单一篇文章 而是过去15个月以来接二连三、没完没了、周复一周

translation.en: cumulative effect, the drip effect of week after week,
translation.zh: 而是过去15个月以来接二连三、没完没了、周复一周

translation.en: month after month for 15 months, a whole series of negative stories about myself.
translation.zh: 月复一月针对我的一系列负面报道

translation.en: When we were going round the second time on the doorstep,
translation.zh: 第二次登门访问选民时

translation.en: people were saying, "Oh, I ain't gonna vote for that bloody queer."
translation.zh: 人们说：“我绝不会投票给恶心的酷儿”

translation.en: I'm not voting for Tatchell. That shit is not happening.
translation.zh: 我绝不会投票给塔切尔这种鸟事绝不能发生

translation.en: - Ooh, careful, careful. - I mustn't swear.
translation.zh: -小心-我不应该讲脏话

translation.en: I can remember
translation.zh: （投票站） 我仍然记得

translation.en: going round knocking on doors on election day in Bermondsey,
translation.zh: 伯蒙德赛补选当天我挨家挨户地登门拜访

translation.en: and we had a list of people who were supposed to be Labour supporters,
translation.zh: 手上有一份理应会支持工党的选民名单

translation.en: and we were knocking on doors trying to get them out to vote.
translation.zh: 我们登门拜访 希望他们能出门投票

translation.en: It was painfully obvious they were not going to vote for Peter.
translation.zh: 很明显地 他们不打算投票给彼得

translation.en: Lord David Edward Sutch, 97.
translation.zh: 大卫爱德华桑奇公爵 97票

translation.en: Peter Tatchell...
translation.zh: 彼得塔切尔…

translation.en: Liberal/SDP gain.
translation.zh: 自由党和社会民主党联盟领先

translation.en: Simon Hughes has been elected as member of parliament for Bermondsey.
translation.zh: 西蒙休斯获选为代表萨瑟克区伯蒙德赛的国会议员

translation.en: And here he is making his victory speech.
translation.zh: 有请他上台致胜选感言

translation.en: [Voiceover] Tatchell thrashed.
translation.zh: 有请他上台致胜选感言 塔切尔彻底失败了

translation.en: Disaster for Labour as Alliance win Bermondsey.
translation.zh: 工党联盟竞选伯蒙德赛国会议员席位迎来惨败

translation.en: As far as I know,
translation.zh: 据我所知

translation.en: it has beaten any swing in this century's political history.
translation.zh: 这是本世纪政治历史上前所未有的胜利

translation.en: The defeated Peter Tatchell's expression this morning
translation.zh: 彼得塔切尔败选后 今早发表谈话

translation.en: belied his bitterness at what he insists has been a smear campaign against him.
translation.zh: 他将败选归咎于对手的抹黑手段

translation.en: Peter's defeat at Bermondsey, it was clearly...
translation.zh: 彼得参选伯蒙德赛国会议员落败原因显然是…

translation.en: you couldn't just join the Labour Party, become an MP
translation.zh: 我们不能指望一个人加入工党当上国会议员

translation.en: and thereby establish lesbian and gay rights.
translation.zh: 就能为同性恋者确立权益

translation.en: That wasn't an easy route,
translation.zh: 这不是一条容易的道路

translation.en: a route that we were going to be able to go through.
translation.zh: 这条道路不容易走

translation.en: The great tragedy of this election is that prejudice
translation.zh: 这场选举的一大悲剧是 偏见与偏执胜过包容与仁慈

translation.en: and bigotry triumphed over tolerance and compassion,
translation.zh: 偏见与偏执胜过包容与仁慈

translation.en: and that smears and lies triumphed over truth and reason.
translation.zh: 污蔑与谎言胜过真相与理性

translation.en: I could imagine a lot of people saw what happened to Peter
translation.zh: 我可以想象得到很多人看到彼得补选失败后的心情

translation.en: over the by-election, and thought
translation.zh: 我可以想象得到很多人看到彼得补选失败后的心情 他们会马上退回柜子里将性向隐藏起来

translation.en: they would retreat straight back into the closet.
translation.zh: 他们会马上退回柜子里将性向隐藏起来

translation.en: The homophobia of that campaign did make me resolve to devote more energy
translation.zh: 那场选举引发的恐同现象赋予我倾注更多力量

translation.en: to fighting for gay rights so that no other person
translation.zh: 去争取同性恋权益以确保没有其他人

translation.en: would have to go through what I went through.
translation.zh: 需要经历我所经历过的一切

translation.en: Do you think it was better on the whole you didn't get elected as an MP?
translation.zh: 你会不会觉得当初不去竞选国会议员对整体情况更好？

translation.en: A social movement outside of parliament
translation.zh: 很多时候发生在国会以外的社会运动

translation.en: is often the real vehicle and mode of change.
translation.zh: 才是能真正带来改变的推动力和驱动力

translation.en: Grassroots movements have been the originators of social change
translation.zh: 草根运动是推动国会议员

translation.en: which parliamentarians have later put into practice.
translation.zh: 实行社会改革的动力

translation.en: ♪ One two three four ♪
translation.zh: 一、二、三、四

translation.en: [Thatcher] Where there is discord, may we bring harmony.
translation.zh: 失序时 愿我们带来和谐

translation.en: Where there is error, may we bring truth.
translation.zh: 出错时 愿我们带来真相

translation.en: Where there is doubt, may we bring faith.
translation.zh: 疑惑时 愿我们带来信仰

translation.en: The 1980s were a horrendous period for the LGBT+ community.
translation.zh: 八十年代是性少数群体最黑暗的时代

translation.en: Government was at war with us.
translation.zh: 政府与我们对战

translation.en: Margaret Thatcher emphasised
translation.zh: 玛格丽特撒切尔倡议

translation.en: a very heterosexist normative sexual morality.
translation.zh: 异性恋才是符合道德价值观的性向

translation.en: The first articles appeared in newspapers about this extraordinary new bathhouse virus.
translation.zh: 报纸媒体开始报导一种感染超强从厕所传播出来的新型病毒

translation.en: At the outset, it was known as the gay plague.
translation.zh: 起初这种病毒被称为“同性恋瘟疫”

translation.en: A Moral Majority report
translation.zh: 《道德主流报》刊登了

translation.en: depicts what is supposed to be a typical American family.
translation.zh: 一张正常美国家庭的照片

translation.en: They're wearing surgical masks.
translation.zh: 照片中的人都带着医用口罩

translation.en: The magazine charges
translation.zh: 该杂志声称

translation.en: the American family is now threatened by the AIDS epidemic.
translation.zh: 美国家庭正受到艾滋病威胁

translation.en: It seemed that the world was doing nothing about it,
translation.zh: 全世界都袖手旁观

translation.en: that...and that discrimination was being allowed.
translation.zh: 允许同性恋者遭受歧视

translation.en: I hesitate to use the word perversion,
translation.zh: （美国同性恋瘟疫夺走三个英国人的性命） 我不想用“变态”这个词

translation.en: but let's face up to the truth of this situation. That's what it is.
translation.zh: 但就事论事 这就是原因

translation.en: Calls for gay people to be refused service in bars and restaurants.
translation.zh: 有人开始呼吁酒吧和餐厅杯葛同性恋者

translation.en: A gay person shared a drink with you. That could've been a death sentence.
translation.zh: 因为跟同性恋者共享一杯饮料可能会招来死神

translation.en: Even demands that we be quarantined as a threat to the public health.
translation.zh: 甚至要求将同性恋者隔离起来以免妨害公共卫生

translation.en: There might be a flea or a mosquito that bites them,
translation.zh: “虱子或蚊虫叮咬过他们后

translation.en: takes their blood and then bites you and puts it in you.
translation.zh: 可能会转过来叮咬我们 害我们染病

translation.en: These people are...they are worse than lepers,
translation.zh: 这些人比麻风病患者还要可怕

translation.en: and aside from the disgusting things they do,
translation.zh: 先别论他们平日做的恶心事

translation.en: look at the threat they pose to everybody.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧他们给我们带来了什么祸害”

translation.en: 75% of all victims are male homosexuals,
translation.zh: 70%染病者是男同性恋者

translation.en: and most of the others are intravenous drug users,
translation.zh: 多数都有用针筒注射毒品的习惯

translation.en: and doctors don't know why.
translation.zh: 医生查不出个所以然来

translation.en: It was like living through a war.
translation.zh: 那个时候的情景就如正在经历一场战争

translation.en: Outside of a battlefield, young men don't die in such numbers.
translation.zh: 战场之外 死去的年轻人并不多

translation.en: People I knew were dying, and there was no hope.
translation.zh: 我身边的人逐渐死去他们找不到希望

translation.en: With AIDS, death was inevitable.
translation.zh: 一旦感染艾滋病 只有死路一条

translation.en: There was no cure, absolutely none, and didn't look as if there was gonna be one.
translation.zh: 艾滋病完全没有解药近期内也不会有

translation.en: Well, to be told that is pretty hard, and we need champions,
translation.zh: 听到这种消息令人非常难受我们需要胜者出来说话

translation.en: and who should step up but Peter Tatchell?
translation.zh: 有谁比彼得塔切尔更合适呢？

translation.en: Our guest tonight makes no secret of the fact that he's a homosexual.
translation.zh: 今晚的嘉宾是个公开出柜的男同性恋者

translation.en: Does anyone want to come in and ask questions about that? Yes.
translation.zh: 有人想提问吗？好的

translation.en: Do you think people in general would be more tolerant of gays if there was a cure for AIDS?
translation.zh: 如果艾滋病有解药人们会不会对男同性恋者更宽容？

translation.en: Well, first of all, we have to get rid of the idea
translation.zh: 首先 我们必须摆脱艾滋病

translation.en: that AIDS is a gay disease, it's not.
translation.zh: 是男同性恋者的疾病这个观念因为它不是

translation.en: AIDS is, I feel, is a consequence of sin.
translation.zh: 我觉得艾滋病是人犯罪的结果

translation.en: Man has strayed from Biblical truths.
translation.zh: 人已经背离了《圣经》的真理

translation.en: Jesus never said a word about homosexuality,
translation.zh: 耶稣从没提过同性恋

translation.en: and lots of people claim to speak on behalf of Jesus,
translation.zh: 很多人借着耶稣的名义发表言论

translation.en: but Jesus never, ever said a word against lesbians or gay men.
translation.zh: 但耶稣从未发表过反同性恋的言论

translation.en: [Peter] I was aghast at the way in which people with HIV were being demonised.
translation.zh: 听到人们将艾滋病患者被妖魔化我感到很吃惊

translation.en: We decided to organise a candlelit vigil
translation.zh: 我们决定在世界卫生峰会于伦敦展开前

translation.en: outside the World Health Minister's Summit on AIDS in London.
translation.zh: 在会场外举办一场烛光守夜会

translation.en: [Stephen] I had imagined it would be a cluster of people
translation.zh: 我想象人潮涌现

translation.en: with torches and candlelights.
translation.zh: 个个手持手电筒和烛光出现

translation.en: It was huge.
translation.zh: 现场非常壮观 那是我参加过规模最大的示威活动

translation.en: It was the largest demonstration I'd ever been in,
translation.zh: 那是我参加过规模最大的示威活动

translation.en: and people were in tears because of the solidarity shown,
translation.zh: 人们流下眼泪因为感受到那股团结的力量

translation.en: because of the connection shown, because of the sudden understanding
translation.zh: 感受到人与人之间的情感恍然间对彼此有了谅解

translation.en: that we had each other, we really did have each other.
translation.zh: 感受到人与人之间的情感恍然间对彼此有了谅解 我们确实是一体的

translation.en: This was a period of deep, deep crisis,
translation.zh: 在如此危急时期

translation.en: and yet it brought out a tremendous spirit
translation.zh: 却赋予了人们强大的归属感

translation.en: of belonging and determination to be accepted.
translation.zh: 以及追求被接纳的决心

translation.en: This put the human rights of people with HIV on the agenda
translation.zh: 这场社会运动将艾滋病患者的权益纳入议程

translation.en: in a way that hadn't happened before,
translation.zh: 这是前所未有的事

translation.en: and did result in the World Health Ministers issuing a declaration against discrimination in favour of
translation.zh: 世界卫生组织也就此事发起了零歧视宣言

translation.en: education and support for people living with the virus.
translation.zh: 以教导人们认识艾滋病接纳艾滋病患者

translation.en: Peter's activism was one of the ingredients
translation.zh: （为艾滋病患者争取平权） 彼得带领的社会运动

translation.en: that led to a better response.
translation.zh: 是促成执法当局给予较正面回应的其中一个要素

translation.en: The government is now seriously worried about AIDS,
translation.zh: 政府开始正视艾滋病

translation.en: hence the making and formal release today of their new TV commercial.
translation.zh: 因此今天正式释出了一则全新宣导片

translation.en: At first, only gays and IV drug users were being killed by AIDS,
translation.zh: 起初只有男同性恋者以及使用针筒注射毒品者 才会患上艾滋病死亡

translation.en: but now we know every one of us could be devastated by it.
translation.zh: 如今我们知道所有人都有可能受到艾滋病感染

translation.en: This was a period of real, intense homophobia,
translation.zh: 那是一个恐同现象十分严重的年代

translation.en: which culminated, of course, in Margaret Thatcher's 1987 speech
translation.zh: 1987年 玛格丽特撒切尔在保守党大会上发表了

translation.en: at the Conservative Party Conference where she attacked the right to be gay.
translation.zh: 攻击男同性恋权益的言论后恐同现象更是进入高峰期

translation.en: Children who need to be taught to respect traditional moral values
translation.zh: 原本被教导要遵守传统道德价值观的孩子

translation.en: are being taught that they have an inalienable right to be gay.
translation.zh: 如今被教导他们拥有成为同性恋者的绝对权利

translation.en: And then introduced Section 28.
translation.zh: 随即发布了“第28条款”

translation.en: The government is to ban the promotion of homosexuality in schools.
translation.zh: 政府禁止学校宣传同性恋

translation.en: Any espousal or promotion of gay life,
translation.zh: 严禁任何支持、宣导同性恋生活

translation.en: any normalising of the gay existence, is prohibited.
translation.zh: 以及正常化同性恋的教导

translation.en: It has been adopted in modified form by countries like Russia,
translation.zh: 这种教育形态也像俄罗斯这种国家修改后采纳

translation.en: who now ban what they call
translation.zh: 俄罗斯至今仍禁止宣导

translation.en: the promotion of non-traditional sexual relations,
translation.zh: 所谓的“非正规性关系”

translation.en: sexual relations between people of the same gender.
translation.zh: 或是“同性恋性关系”

translation.en: Thatcher made legislation
translation.zh: 撒切尔立法

translation.en: whereby homosexuality could not be taught in schools
translation.zh: 禁止学校宣导同性恋

translation.en: or shown in any kind of positive light at all.
translation.zh: 或是将同性恋正面化

translation.en: But then unintended consequences of her doing that
translation.zh: 只是此举适得其反

translation.en: actually galvanised our community.
translation.zh: 反而导致同性恋群体奋起反抗

translation.en: It brought women and men together.
translation.zh: 将男男女女聚在一起

translation.en: Lesbians and gay men who'd been, kind of, drifting apart all the way through went,
translation.zh: 他们都是找不到归属感的男女同性恋者

translation.en: "No, we'll stand together on this," and fantastic solidarity emerged,
translation.zh: “不行 这事我们必须团结”于是不可思议的团结现象出现了

translation.en: and we got the Stonewall movement off the back of that, and we got the OutRage! movement off the back of that.
translation.zh: 于是发生了石墙暴动事件以及义愤组织的崛起

translation.en: [Peter] OutRage! wanted to change the system.
translation.zh: 自由！ 义愤组织旨在改变国家政策

translation.en: Our goal was to secure respect, dignity and rights for queer people.
translation.zh: 我们的目标是为酷儿群体争取尊重、尊严和权益

translation.en: Repealing anti-LGBT+ laws,
translation.zh: 废除反性少数群体的法律

translation.en: changing the way in which institutions like the police and judiciary operated.
translation.zh: 改变警方和司法部等执法单位的操作形式

translation.en: This was an agenda for a fundamental transformation of British society.
translation.zh: 这是旨在从根本上改变英国社会的一大议程

translation.en: ♪ We're here because we're queer ♪
translation.zh: 我们站在这里 因为我们都是酷儿

translation.en: ♪ Because we're here because we're queer ♪
translation.zh: 我们站在这里 因为我们都是酷儿

translation.en: Like every successful social movement in history,
translation.zh: 就像历史上所有成功的社会运动

translation.en: we also believed there was a role for direct action and non-violent civil disobedience.
translation.zh: 我们也相信每场对峙性且非暴力的抗议行动都有一个目的

translation.en: OutRage! allowed a group of young men in the main,
translation.zh: 义愤组织允许主流社会中一群因受到不平等待遇

translation.en: who were just incredibly angry about the way they were being treated,
translation.zh: 而感到极度愤怒的年轻人有了宣泄的出口

translation.en: Peter allowed that to be expressed.
translation.zh: 彼得给了他们一个表达愤怒的管道

translation.en: We're queer, we're here and Soho's ours.
translation.zh: 我们是酷儿 我们就站在这里苏活区是我们的

translation.en: Protestors say it's a discriminatory and outdated law,
translation.zh: 示威者认为这是一条带有歧视且过时的法令

translation.en: which turns Britain's estimated 5 million gays and lesbians
translation.zh: 导致英国约五百万名同性恋者

translation.en: into second-class citizens.
translation.zh: 变成二等公民

translation.en: We're gonna draw attention to the government
translation.zh: 我们要让政府正视

translation.en: the fact that Britain has more anti-gay laws
translation.zh: 英国反同性恋的法令

translation.en: than any other West European country.
translation.zh: 比其他西欧国家来得多

translation.en: I spent the first couple of years,
translation.zh: 我年轻时头几年

translation.en: young years in the army, yeah, with my arse against the wall.
translation.zh: 都在军中服役 整天命悬一线

translation.en: I didn't want to be buggered.
translation.zh: 我不想被鸡奸

translation.en: I didn't want these people coming nowhere near me.
translation.zh: 我不要这群人靠近我

translation.en: The ban on lesbians and gay men serving in the armed forces
translation.zh: 禁止同性恋者入伍

translation.en: is hypocritical when some of its most famous military commanders
translation.zh: 是毫无根据的政策因为多数有名的军官将领

translation.en: have been homosexual.
translation.zh: 是毫无根据的政策因为多数有名的军官将领 是同性恋者

translation.en: I regarded him, I have to say, from time to time
translation.zh: 有时候 我会认为他这个人

translation.en: as a little bit of an irritant, but that was a good thing.
translation.zh: 令人感到有点无所适从 但那是好事

translation.en: We give public recognition to love that we feel for each other
translation.zh: 我们要宣告我们对彼此的爱

translation.en: and the commitment we freely make to each other.
translation.zh: 以及在自由意识下对彼此许下的承诺

translation.en: Civil marriage in this country was a right we have fought for.
translation.zh: 同性婚姻合法化是我们目前在英国要争取的权利

translation.en: We are now fighting for the right of our relationship
translation.zh: 我们要为我们的感情关系

translation.en: to be recognised by the state.
translation.zh: 争取获得国家认可的权利

translation.en: They wouldn't let us get married!
translation.zh: 政府不让我们结婚

translation.en: Different people at different stages of their lives
translation.zh: 不同的人 在不同的人生阶段

translation.en: did want to contribute and fight and struggle in different ways.
translation.zh: 希望以不同的方式展开对抗

translation.en: We got together, and decided to form
translation.zh: 我们聚在一起 广集思益 最终决定成立一个同性恋组织叫石墙组织

translation.en: a new lesbian and gay group, Stonewall, to work with
translation.zh: 最终决定成立一个同性恋组织叫石墙组织 这个组织主要与政党政府单位和司法机构合作

translation.en: political parties, and political and legal institutions.
translation.zh: 这个组织主要与政党政府单位和司法机构合作

translation.en: OutRage! would do the provocative, confrontational things,
translation.zh: 义愤组织负责采取煽动性和对峙性的行动

translation.en: then Stonewall would step in and say, well, "Come and talk to us,
translation.zh: 而石墙组织则会介入表示：“来找我们聊吧

translation.en: "then you have to talk to those nasty OutRage! people."
translation.zh: 这样就能避免接触义愤组织的人”

translation.en: We were talking about different ways of achieving the same thing.
translation.zh: 重点是通过不同的方式实现同一个目标

translation.en: When Stonewall went in to talk to cabinet ministers and prime ministers,
translation.zh: 石墙组织开始跟内阁部长和首相展开对话时

translation.en: there was a fear from the establishment
translation.zh: 有人担心这种安排会导致

translation.en: that Tatchell and his troops would be erecting the barricades
translation.zh: 塔切尔和他的团队会筑起藩篱

translation.en: and Stonewall was behind there, having a cup of tea.
translation.zh: 而石墙组织的人则只是轻松地坐在后面喝茶

translation.en: What do we want? Equality!
translation.zh: -我们要的是什么？-平权！

translation.en: At the same time, there was a whole litany
translation.zh: 与此同时 警方开始采取了

translation.en: of really aggravating police activities.
translation.zh: 一连串风风火火的逮捕行动

translation.en: The toilet at Victoria Station is one of the many places
translation.zh: 维多利亚车站的公共厕所

translation.en: where police are arresting men for sexual offences.
translation.zh: 成为警方逮捕性犯罪者的场所之一

translation.en: Excuse me, sir? Police officers, you're under arrest.
translation.zh: 先生 打扰一下我们是警察 你被逮捕了

translation.en: Police officers would dress up as hunky, gay men,
translation.zh: 警察会乔装成健壮帅气的男同性恋者

translation.en: and would try and entice people into kissing and fondling them,
translation.zh: 企图引诱他人跟他们接吻或亲密接触

translation.en: and would then promptly arrest them.
translation.zh: 然后突然将对方逮捕归案

translation.en: The Metropolitan Police are mounting an agent provocateur,
translation.zh: 伦敦警察厅针对男同性恋者发起了

translation.en: an entrapment operation against gay men.
translation.zh: 诱捕和突围行动

translation.en: Escalating arrests of gay and bisexual men.
translation.zh: 导致越来越多男同性恋者和双性恋者遭到逮捕

translation.en: What they are doing is illegal
translation.zh: 他们的所作所为是违法的

translation.en: and contrary to the Home Office guidelines.
translation.zh: 有违内政部法令

translation.en: Rising levels of queer-bashing violence, and even murder.
translation.zh: 造成酷儿暴力袭击案甚至凶杀案节节上升

translation.en: Murders of gay men are notoriously difficult to solve,
translation.zh: 男同性恋者凶杀案向来难以破案

translation.en: which means that, in many cases,
translation.zh: 这意味着 大多数情况下

translation.en: the killers are still at large, and could strike again.
translation.zh: 凶手仍然逍遥法外很可能会再次发动袭击

translation.en: [Crowd] Arrest the murderers, not the victims!
translation.zh: 逮捕凶手 而不是受害者！

translation.en: The police were persecuting us, not protecting us.
translation.zh: （我只是在寻找伴侣 抓我吧） 警方是在迫害我们而不是在保护我们

translation.en: If you think homosexuality is legal in Britain, you're wrong.
translation.zh: 如果你认为同性恋在英国是合法的那你就搞错了？

translation.en: A pretty good party. Dancing, music, socialising.
translation.zh: 在气氛美好的派对上跳舞、听音乐、聊天

translation.en: But, by introducing those two men to each other,
translation.zh: 在气氛美好的派对上跳舞、听音乐、聊天 但是这个人介绍两个男人认识

translation.en: he's just committed a crime.
translation.zh: 他已经违法了

translation.en: Could all those people who are gonna be handing themselves to the police
translation.zh: 准备向警方自首的人

translation.en: stand just outside the main entrance to the police station?
translation.zh: 能不能都站到警局大门前？

translation.en: My favourite involvement with OutRage!
translation.zh: 加入义愤组织后我最热衷的活动是接吻行动

translation.en: was the kissing, actually kissing on camera.
translation.zh: 加入义愤组织后我最热衷的活动是接吻行动 也就是在镜头前接吻

translation.en: This man gave me his telephone number so that I could get in touch with him,
translation.zh: 这个男人给了我他的电话号码让我可以联络上他

translation.en: and we could have a sexual liaison.
translation.zh: 然后一起发生性关系

translation.en: That is illegal in this country,
translation.zh: 这事在这个国家是合法的

translation.en: and that is a disgrace, and, if they want me,
translation.zh: 这是一个奇耻大辱如果他们想要抓我

translation.en: take me now in front of the whole fucking world.
translation.zh: 现在就在全世界面前抓我

translation.en: We're handing ourselves in as sex criminals.
translation.zh: 我们以性犯罪者的身份自首

translation.en: No more, no more, no more, no more, no more, no more, no more, no more!
translation.zh: 适可而止！

translation.en: Peter has a genius for picking up things that are gonna create a headline.
translation.zh: 彼得非常擅长创造新闻头条

translation.en: [Peter] It empowered LGBT+ people
translation.zh: 这种行为给了性少数群体力量

translation.en: to believe that they didn't have to be victims anymore.
translation.zh: 让他们相信他们不再是受害者

translation.en: We could take on powerful institutions and laws,
translation.zh: 我们可以影响执法单位和法律

translation.en: and defeat them.
translation.zh: 并且打败制度

translation.en: It also made straight people aware
translation.zh: 此举也让异性恋者意识到

translation.en: of the scale of discrimination that we faced, and the level of hate crime and violence.
translation.zh: 我们所面对的歧视憎恶和暴力规模有多大

translation.en: In interviews, he's so, so earnest and deadpan
translation.zh: 接受访问时 提到严重议题

translation.en: in the way that he talks about serious issues,
translation.zh: 他表现得非常诚恳和严肃

translation.en: you don't realise that lurking behind that
translation.zh: 我们完全不会意识到表面下

translation.en: is also somebody who enjoys a bit of wildness and anarchism.
translation.zh: 藏着一个有点疯狂喜好不受法律约束的人

translation.en: From the beginning of OutRage!
translation.zh: 九十年代中期 义愤组织崛起后

translation.en: through to the mid-1990s, public opinion
translation.zh: 九十年代中期 义愤组织崛起后 民意出现巨大的变化开始支持性少数群体平权运动

translation.en: began to dramatically shift in favour of LGBT+ equality.
translation.zh: 民意出现巨大的变化开始支持性少数群体平权运动

translation.en: Shame, shame!
translation.zh: 可耻！

translation.en: I did sometimes feel antagonistic to Peter,
translation.zh: 我有时确实会对彼得产生敌意

translation.en: and didn't agree with him.
translation.zh: 我不完全赞同他

translation.en: Occasionally, I may have even thought
translation.zh: 有时候 我甚至觉得一切只是在满足他的虚荣心

translation.en: he was on a bit of an ego trip, you know?
translation.zh: 有时候 我甚至觉得一切只是在满足他的虚荣心 （《这是你要的人生吗？》第一部下半段）

translation.en: Well, you're a leading member of OutRage!, and this is the militant gay group
translation.zh: 你是义愤组织的领导人这是一个激进男同性恋组织

translation.en: which seeks to expose and to out gay people in high places
translation.zh: 目的是揭发位高权重者的同性恋身份

translation.en: who'd prefer to keep their sexuality private.
translation.zh: 但是这些人宁可隐藏真实的性取向

translation.en: This is you in action.
translation.zh: 这是你个人的宗旨

translation.en: We tried to speak with the church,
translation.zh: 我们试过与教会展开对话

translation.en: we tried to be reasonable, and they would not listen.
translation.zh: 我们想跟他们讲理但是他们都拒绝聆听

translation.en: They refused to meet with us.
translation.zh: 拒绝跟我们会晤

translation.en: They refused to have any dialogue, so, in those circumstances,
translation.zh: 拒绝展开任何形式的对话在这种情况下

translation.en: we felt that we had to adopt more confrontational tactics.
translation.zh: 我们只能采取对抗法

translation.en: Until last week, the Bishop of London's sex life was his own business.
translation.zh: 上星期前 伦敦主教的性生活还是自己的事 无关他人

translation.en: Then, the Right Reverend David Hope
translation.zh: 直到大卫霍普主教

translation.en: suddenly found himself having to discuss his sexual nature
translation.zh: 开始在国内各大报章上谈起自己的性取向

translation.en: in every newspaper in the land,
translation.zh: 主教性取向便成了焦点

translation.en: all because he'd been sent a letter from this man
translation.zh: 起因是大卫霍普主教不断收到一名男子的来信

translation.en: urging him to come out as homosexual.
translation.zh: 对方促他赶紧公开出柜

translation.en: What business is it of yours what he does?
translation.zh: 他的作为跟你有什么关系？

translation.en: Outing people was not popular with everybody,
translation.zh: 不是每个同性恋者都支持公开出柜

translation.en: including some gay people who were themselves out,
translation.zh: 某些已经公开出柜的人也不赞同

translation.en: 'cause they could remember the time they hadn't been out,
translation.zh: 因为他们忘不了出柜前

translation.en: and the difficulties of that,
translation.zh: 所经历过的种种困难

translation.en: and to declare that someone is gay affects not just them
translation.zh: 公开出柜不仅影响了他们的人生

translation.en: but their relationships with their family and so on.
translation.zh: 也影响了他们与家人的关系

translation.en: But you took the view that outing certain people
translation.zh: 但是你认为 在某些特定情况下

translation.en: under certain circumstances was the right thing to do.
translation.zh: 敦促某些人公开出柜是正确的事

translation.en: Outing, for me, is queer self-defence.
translation.zh: 敦促某些人公开出柜是正确的事 对我而言 公开出柜是酷儿自我保护的行为

translation.en: We never outed anyone because they were gay in the closet.
translation.zh: 我们从来不会敦促任何真正的同性恋者公开出柜

translation.en: It's only because they were being hypocritical
translation.zh: 要求某些人公开出柜是因为他们心口不一

translation.en: and colluding with homophobic laws and values.
translation.zh: 甚至有份参与制定恐同法令和价值观

translation.en: [George] The outings, there were ten bishops involved.
translation.zh: 有是个主教被迫公开出柜

translation.en: I knew them all personally, and I think it hurt them very deeply.
translation.zh: 我们私底下都认识的我认为这事深深伤害了他们

translation.en: I'm George Carey.
translation.zh: 我叫乔治卡瑞

translation.en: I was Archbishop of Canterbury from 1991 to 2002.
translation.zh: 于1991年到2002年之间担任坎特伯雷大主教

translation.en: Peter was pretty active in the human rights agenda.
translation.zh: 彼得在争取平权方面不遗余力

translation.en: I thought he was a bullying kind of chap
translation.zh: 但我认为他只是个欺人太甚

translation.en: trying to get his own way, and I didn't like that.
translation.zh: 为达目的而不择手段的家伙我不欣赏这种人

translation.en: Dr Hope is one of the most senior of the Anglican bishops.
translation.zh: 霍普博士是英国圣公会的资深主教之一

translation.en: No-one at this level in the church
translation.zh: 他是第一个在教会中

translation.en: has spoken out so explicitly about his sexuality before.
translation.zh: 公开谈论自己性取向的人

translation.en: David took it in a very remarkable way.
translation.zh: 大卫采取了非常震撼的方式回应

translation.en: He called journalists around, and he said,
translation.zh: 他把记者叫来说

translation.en: "I want to tell you my sexuality is grey."
translation.zh: “我要告诉你们 我的性取向不明确”

translation.en: Some may choose to describe themselves as being homosexual,
translation.zh: 有些人选择把自己归纳为同性恋者

translation.en: some as heterosexual.
translation.zh: 或是异性恋者

translation.en: For some, the area is slightly greyer, and I think I was saying
translation.zh: 但对某些人来说 那是较灰色的地带我想表达的是

translation.en: that that's the sort of area I find myself in.
translation.zh: 我就是处在这种灰色地带中

translation.en: I never agreed with forcibly outing people.
translation.zh: 我从来都不赞同强制他人公开出柜的行为

translation.en: I could absolutely see the temptation,
translation.zh: 我完全理解那种想要催促他们公开出柜的诱惑

translation.en: especially where there was hypocrisy going on.
translation.zh: 尤其看到那些表里不一的人的时候

translation.en: People who were campaigning for Section 28,
translation.zh: 他们支持第28条款

translation.en: who were campaigning against an equal age of consent,
translation.zh: 支持提高法定性交年龄

translation.en: who were voting through homophobic legislation,
translation.zh: 投票通过恐同法律

translation.en: and yet most of us knew that they themselves were gay.
translation.zh: 然而 大部分人都知道他们本身其实是同性恋者

translation.en: It's deplorable when people issue homophobic remarks,
translation.zh: 身为同性恋者 发表恐同言论

translation.en: and actually make life worse
translation.zh: 导致其他酷儿兄弟姐妹

translation.en: for their queer sisters and brothers
translation.zh: 生活在水深火热之中

translation.en: while being gay themselves.
translation.zh: 是非常可耻的行为

translation.en: That's reprehensible,
translation.zh: 这种行为固然可恶

translation.en: but I still don't think it gives you the moral high ground
translation.zh: 但是我仍然不认为我们有资格站在道德高地

translation.en: to actually get out there and condemn them or tear them
translation.zh: 去谴责和摧毁他们

translation.en: kicking and screaming out of the closet.
translation.zh: 去催促和强迫他们公开出柜

translation.en: This bishop had done nothing
translation.zh: 这位主教从没做错过任何事

translation.en: to merit this letter and this public exposure in the end.
translation.zh: 却因为这封信而暴露在公众目光之下

translation.en: Well, it's a bit much for the church to talk about intrusions.
translation.zh: 教会说我们恶意干涉这个说法未免太过分

translation.en: I mean, the church for 2,000 years has been intruding
translation.zh: 过去两千年以来教会也干涉了不少同性恋者的人生

translation.en: on the lives of lesbian and gay people, saying we're sick
translation.zh: 过去两千年以来教会也干涉了不少同性恋者的人生 一直谴责我们有病、有罪、不道德死后会下地狱遭到烈火焚烧

translation.en: and sinful and immoral, and we're going to burn in hell.
translation.zh: 一直谴责我们有病、有罪、不道德死后会下地狱遭到烈火焚烧

translation.en: And here we have the outrageous outer of them all, Peter Tatchell.
translation.zh: 他是公开出柜者的代表性人物塔切尔

translation.en: Do you not think you're kind of being a bit hypocritical by actually outing these people,
translation.zh: 难道你不认为逼迫这些人公开出柜

translation.en: and then they've gone on to suffer that same discrimination
translation.zh: 造成他们必须面临你们所遭遇到的歧视

translation.en: that the people that you're trying to protect are?
translation.zh: 也说明你是个虚伪的人吗？

translation.en: You seem to me to be shooting yourself in the foot.
translation.zh: 你这么做是在伤害自己人 你不应该这么做你只是在鼓吹法西斯主义

translation.en: You should not do this, man. What you want is a form of fascism.
translation.zh: 你不应该这么做你只是在鼓吹法西斯主义

translation.en: Well, the press...
translation.zh: 那是媒体…

translation.en: You can't just wreck people's lives and everything.
translation.zh: 你没有权利去摧毁别人的人生

translation.en: Whose lives have been wrecked? How do you know that?
translation.zh: -我摧毁了谁的人生？-你怎么知道呢？

translation.en: It's the old ends justified the means argument.
translation.zh: 辩论到了最后 就得以见真章

translation.en: No, I'm not saying we'd do anything.
translation.zh: 我不是指我们会不择手段

translation.en: [George] It was wrong to do. It was wrong to do because some of these people were very old.
translation.zh: 这么做是错的因为有些人已经很老了

translation.en: One or two were married and living faithful married lives.
translation.zh: 其中一两个已经结婚了过着忠诚不二的婚姻生活

translation.en: You heard some rumour, you had... It's not rumour. It's not rumour.
translation.zh: -谣传指 你…-不是谣传

translation.en: Do you have kind of secret policemen who go around, sort of, taking photographs?
translation.zh: 你是不是到处安设“卧底”去偷拍他人的照片？

translation.en: No, we don't.
translation.zh: 没有 没有的事

translation.en: It's a kind of gay Gestapo, really, isn't it?
translation.zh: 有点像同性恋群体的“盖世太保”对吧？

translation.en: Everybody knows that, high up in the church,
translation.zh: 每个人都知道教会中有些位高权重的人

translation.en: there are lesbian and gay people.
translation.zh: 是同性恋者

translation.en: How can you in all conscious act as the judge and jury
translation.zh: 在这些事件中你是如何怀揣绝对的良心

translation.en: in these matters,
translation.zh: 去判断和裁定对错

translation.en: and how dare you define a man by his sexuality.
translation.zh: 凭什么去判断一个男人的性取向？

translation.en: What he decides is basically to bomb his way to the
translation.zh: 他的目的是通过制造轰动来争取谈判的筹码

translation.en: negotiating table, and release a few names of some bishops.
translation.zh: 他的目的是通过制造轰动来争取谈判的筹码 于是才向媒体释出几个主教的名字

translation.en: That is repugnant behaviour.
translation.zh: 这种行为令人反感

translation.en: Society continues to be more homophobic because of people
translation.zh: 塔切尔先生 这个社会因为你这种人以及你所采取的极端手段

translation.en: like you, Mr Tatchell, and your outrageous tactics.
translation.zh: 塔切尔先生 这个社会因为你这种人以及你所采取的极端手段 变得更加恐同了

translation.en: This charge of counterproductive tactics
translation.zh: 所有崛起中的社会运动

translation.en: has always been used, you know, against every rising social movement.
translation.zh: 都曾采取这种对抗性策略

translation.en: It was used against the Suffragettes in Britain.
translation.zh: 当年英国女性参政权运动

translation.en: It was used against the black civil rights movement in the United States.
translation.zh: 以及美国黑人民权运动皆采取了对抗性策略

translation.en: Most historians accept that the catharsis
translation.zh: 大部分历史学家都认同

translation.en: of those direct-action protests was the necessary spark
translation.zh: 通过对峙行动宣泄不满是有必要的火花

translation.en: to generate public awareness about the scale of discrimination,
translation.zh: 有助于激发公众意识到我们受到歧视的程度

translation.en: and to build momentum for change.
translation.zh: 建立改变的动力

translation.en: Whatever the critics may say,
translation.zh: 无论时评家怎么说

translation.en: the outing campaign was incredibly effective.
translation.zh: 这项公开出柜运动非常有效

translation.en: As far as I know,
translation.zh: 据我所知

translation.en: none of those bishops ever again said anything anti-gay.
translation.zh: 这些主教再也没发表过任何反同性恋者言论了

translation.en: 52 years of civil disobedience, Peter.
translation.zh: 彼得 这要经历52年的非暴力抗议

translation.en: 53 now. 53 years, I beg your pardon.
translation.zh: -如今已经53年了-53年了 不好意思

translation.en: Do you remember Easter Sunday 1988?
translation.zh: -如今已经53年了-53年了 不好意思 你还记得1988年的复活节吗？
是1998年才对

translation.en: The Archbishop of Canterbury's traditional Easter sermon
translation.zh: 坎特伯雷大主教为复活节证道时

translation.en: was interrupted today by a gay rights protest.
translation.zh: 遭到一个同性恋平权示威者中断

translation.en: Demonstrators scaled the pulpit,
translation.zh: 示威者冲上讲坛

translation.en: waving banners and shouting at the archbishop.
translation.zh: 挥舞着旗帜 对着大主教呐喊口号

translation.en: Lord, You call us all to be men and women of peace.
translation.zh: 主啊 你要我们成为爱好和平的男女

translation.en: We had tried for eight years to get a meeting with the archbishop.
translation.zh: 过去八年以来我们企图与大主教展开对话

translation.en: He was saying that there should be no legal recognition of same-sex relationships.
translation.zh: 他宣称同性恋不应该合法化

translation.en: We were faced with the option,
translation.zh: 我们有两个选择

translation.en: either give up and walk away or go on to challenge him,
translation.zh: 第一是放弃不理 第二是与他对峙

translation.en: and where better than in his own cathedral
translation.zh: 论对峙 有什么比在复活节星期日

translation.en: at Canterbury on Easter Sunday
translation.zh: 趁全球直播他在他的坎特伯雷大教堂证道时闯进去

translation.en: when his sermon had been televised around the world?
translation.zh: 来得更合适呢？

translation.en: My name's Adrian Arbib. I'm a journalist.
translation.zh: 我叫阿德里安艾尔比 我是一名记者

translation.en: We were told to be at Canterbury Cathedral,
translation.zh: 我们按照吩咐到坎特伯雷大教堂等候

translation.en: to be as close to the front as possible for the Easter sermon.
translation.zh: 站在越靠近讲坛的位置越好

translation.en: And we were told just to, you know, be ready with a camera.
translation.zh: 我们受到指示 要随时准备拍照

translation.en: So, I went in with a little film camera.
translation.zh: 于是我带着一台胶片相机前往现场

translation.en: Remember how He told you
translation.zh: 记得祂跟你说过

translation.en: while He was with you in Galilee, and then...
translation.zh: 祂在加利利与你同在 然后…

translation.en: Suddenly, these people rushed into the pulpit.
translation.zh: 突然之间 这群人冲上讲坛

translation.en: Peter was there.
translation.zh: 其中一个是彼得

translation.en: I was pushed to one side,
translation.zh: 我被推往一边

translation.en: and he bellowed into the microphone for some minutes.
translation.zh: 他对着麦克风大喊大叫了一阵子

translation.en: Dr Carey supports discrimination against lesbian and gay people.
translation.zh: 卡瑞博士支持歧视同性恋者

translation.en: He opposes lesbian and gay human rights.
translation.zh: 他反对同性恋者拥有人权

translation.en: This is not a Christian teaching.
translation.zh: 这不是基督教的教义

translation.en: I just leapt up and sort of got as close as I could.
translation.zh: 我赶紧从座位上跳起来尽可能地靠近讲坛

translation.en: I was trapped in the pulpit. There was a stunned silence.
translation.zh: 我被困在讲坛上全场陷入震惊 一片肃静

translation.en: The congregation start clapping, and they were going,
translation.zh: 接着会众开始鼓掌 有人喊道

translation.en: "Out, out, out," which I thought was hilarious.
translation.zh: “出柜吧” 我认为挺好笑的

translation.en: And then the officials started to come and pull people off.
translation.zh: 接着警察开始上来把人拖走

translation.en: Peter's shouting, of course, it echoes throughout the whole cathedral, which is, like, epic.
translation.zh: 彼得不断呐喊 回音响彻整个大教堂那是非常难忘的一幕

translation.en: It is wrong for Dr Carey
translation.zh: 卡瑞博士不应该说

translation.en: to say that people who are lesbian and gay should be discriminated against at work.
translation.zh: 同性恋者应该在职场上受到歧视

translation.en: They were quite violent. They weren't kind of being gentle about it.
translation.zh: 警察下手非常凶狠 毫不留情

translation.en: As they were being pulled off the pulpit, they were punching Peter's hands.
translation.zh: 示威者被拖下讲坛警察对着彼得的双手捶打

translation.en: Peter was actually trying to hang onto the pulpit,
translation.zh: 因为他企图抓住讲坛

translation.en: and they were actually punching, you know, really hard.
translation.zh: 警察下手真的很重 非常重

translation.en: I ask you, I beseech you.
translation.zh: 我恳求你们

translation.en: About a good three or four minutes,
translation.zh: 整个过程持续三四分钟

translation.en: so it was a really effective protest 'cause it made front page.
translation.zh: 是个非常有效的示威行动因为成功上了头条

translation.en: The media love all that kind of stuff.
translation.zh: 媒体都喜欢这种东西

translation.en: My reaction at the time was anger
translation.zh: 我当时的反应是愤怒

translation.en: mixed with some degree of sadness about it.
translation.zh: 夹杂着在某种程度的悲伤

translation.en: Why does he do this?
translation.zh: 他为什么要这么做？

translation.en: It's a kind of scorched earth policy, you know?
translation.zh: 这是一种两败俱伤的做法 不是吗？

translation.en: You don't make friends that way.
translation.zh: 这种行为是不讨喜的

translation.en: Storm into the pulpit,
translation.zh: 冲上讲坛

translation.en: get your own way, bellow and then retreat, you know?
translation.zh: 不择手段 引发骚动 然后走开

translation.en: Where is the justification for this?
translation.zh: 不择手段 引发骚动 然后走开 有什么合理性可言？

translation.en: As far as I'm concerned, it doesn't damage me, but I'm worried when it hurts other people,
translation.zh: 就我而言 这不至于会摧毁我我只是担心其他人会受到伤害

translation.en: and disrupts a Christian service, as they did this morning.
translation.zh: 他们扰乱了今早基督徒弥撒的秩序

translation.en: Peter Tatchell was completely unapologetic in court.
translation.zh: 彼得塔切尔在法庭上毫无悔意

translation.en: He said there was a moral obligation to stand up against human rights abuses.
translation.zh: 他说对抗人权遭到践踏是一种道德义务

translation.en: We put the issue of the church's homophobia on the public agenda.
translation.zh: 我们要将教会的恐同心态暴露在公众目光之下

translation.en: Most of the letters, though, were hostile. That's the problem.
translation.zh: 多数用词都充满敌意 这才是问题

translation.en: Perhaps too many people watching saw what I saw.
translation.zh: 也许多数人跟我看到的一样

translation.en: Oh, here goes Peter Tatchell again,
translation.zh: “又是彼得塔切尔”

translation.en: rather than listening to what you had to say.
translation.zh: 而不是聆听你真正想要表达的言论

translation.en: Well, I was a member of the unsuspecting congregation,
translation.zh: 我是其中一个措手不及的会众

translation.en: and I was appalled and I was embarrassed.
translation.zh: 我感到震惊之余 也感到羞愧不已

translation.en: My elderly mother and my homophobic older brother were shocked and disgusted,
translation.zh: 我母亲和我那个恐同的哥哥感到既震惊又恶心

translation.en: and then to have this going on in front of me was, I thought, entirely counter-productive to the wider course.
translation.zh: 这种事竟然发生在我眼前我因此对同性恋更反感

translation.en: You think maintaining the decorum of a church service
translation.zh: 你认为维持教会弥撒的秩序

translation.en: is more important than dealing with people who violate lesbian and gay human rights.
translation.zh: 比对付糟蹋同性恋者人权的人更加重要吗？

translation.en: I think you chose your target completely incorrectly.
translation.zh: 我认为你搞错对象了

translation.en: I know what works and what doesn't.
translation.zh: 我知道什么行得通 什么行不通

translation.en: I don't know that you do know what works.
translation.zh: 我不知道你在盘算什么

translation.en: On this particular case...
translation.zh: 针对这件事…

translation.en: I think you're dogmatic and I think you're arrogant.
translation.zh: 我认为你是个专横跋扈高傲自大的人

translation.en: I think it was a mistake on Peter's part.
translation.zh: 我觉得错在彼得身上

translation.en: Does it worry you, being disliked?
translation.zh: “被讨厌”会不会让你感到困扰？

translation.en: I'd much rather be loved and appreciated,
translation.zh: 我较想成为一个受人爱戴和敬仰的人

translation.en: and, also, it's quite painful when all the good things
translation.zh: 因此当我发现自己过去所成就的一切公义

translation.en: that I've achieved in the past get totally ignored.
translation.zh: 被彻底无视后 我感到十分痛心

translation.en: We all make missteps and nobody's an angel.
translation.zh: 我们都会犯错 没有人是天使

translation.en: I'm not saying Peter's perfect or he's the ideal activist.
translation.zh: 我并不是指彼得是完美的人也不是指他是个理想的社运人士

translation.en: Sometimes you agree with him, sometimes you disagree with him.
translation.zh: 有时我们赞同他 有时不赞同他

translation.en: The morality I ask for myself I give to others.
translation.zh: 我对自己和他人的道德标准是一致的

translation.en: If anybody wants to come to a gay pride event, which I hold as very important, and disrupt it...
translation.zh: 如果有人想来我非常看重的同性恋骄傲活动捣乱…

translation.en: You wouldn't have them thrown out? No, of course not.
translation.zh: -你不会把他们赶出去吗？-当然不会

translation.en: Well, you should!
translation.zh: 你应该把他们赶走才对

translation.en: I would defend their right to protest
translation.zh: 我会捍卫他们抗议的权利

translation.en: because protest is fundamental to the lifeblood of a democracy.
translation.zh: 因为抗议是民主命脉的根本

translation.en: Someone said that you were the most hated man in Britain.
translation.zh: 有人说你是全英国最令人讨厌的人

translation.en: Public enemy number one,
translation.zh: 头号人民公敌

translation.en: a gay fascist and even a homosexual terrorist.
translation.zh: 崇尚法西斯主义的男同性恋者甚至是个同性恋恐怖分子

translation.en: I wear these epithets with pride,
translation.zh: 我带着骄傲接受这些绰号

translation.en: but I've gotta say that it was very, very tough.
translation.zh: 我带着骄傲接受这些绰号 但我不得不承认 非常辛苦

translation.en: Police constable Frost has brought the letter back to the office.
translation.zh: 康丝特勃福特斯警官将信件带回警局

translation.en: Peter Tatchell, you are a sick piece of shit.
translation.zh: “彼得塔切尔 你是个变态

translation.en: How can you speak with pride about being gay?
translation.zh: 身为同性恋者凭什么语气这么高傲？

translation.en: Sticking or taking another man's prick up the arse is not natural.
translation.zh: 把那话儿插进另一个男人的屁眼里是不符合自然的行为

translation.en: Why do you think God made women?
translation.zh: 你认为上帝为何要创造女人？”

translation.en: I wouldn't want to overreact to the letter.
translation.zh: 我没必要为这封信感到激动

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没必要

translation.en: You're an outcast. You should be gassed.
translation.zh: “你是个异类应该要被毒气毒死才对

translation.en: Gays are only slightly more acceptable than Pakis.
translation.zh: “相较于巴基斯坦人男同性恋者只是更容易被接纳而已

translation.en: Die soon, you cunt.
translation.zh: 赶紧去死吧 臭娘炮”

translation.en: So, not only homophobic, but a bit of racism thrown in for good measure.
translation.zh: 不仅是恐同心态还涉及了种族歧视心态

translation.en: At the time, I was vilified for campaigns
translation.zh: 那个年代我因为倡导降低性同意年龄

translation.en: like an equal age of consent, and for LGBT+ inclusive education in schools.
translation.zh: 以及将性少数群体教育纳入课程大纲而遭到大众丑化

translation.en: Peter Tatchell has stood outside a school
translation.zh: 彼得塔切尔站在校门外

translation.en: handing out literature demonstrating in favour of they're being educated to make a choice.
translation.zh: 分发倡导性取向自由权的读物

translation.en: Read the literature. It's OK to be gay.
translation.zh: 请看看这些读物 是同性恋没关系

translation.en: You may be gay yourselves.
translation.zh: 你也有可能是同性恋者

translation.en: With messages like 'How Do You Know Unless You've Tried It?'
translation.zh: 传单主要传达“不试不知道”的信息

translation.en: they handed out leaflets to children and parents.
translation.zh: 他们将这些传单分发给小孩和家长

translation.en: Is that your son? He may be gay.
translation.zh: 他是不是你的儿子？他很可能是男同性恋者

translation.en: That information should be provided by teachers but it's not.
translation.zh: 老师应该教导这些信息可惜他们没有这么做

translation.en: I was denounced even by many people in the LGBT+ community.
translation.zh: 我甚至遭到性少数群体谴责

translation.en: What I'm worried about is the effect, the long-term effect, that this sort of action will have.
translation.zh: 我担心的是这种行为所带来的长期影响

translation.en: I think it's an angry mode of politics that verges on the self-righteous,
translation.zh: 我相信是这种自以为是的正义激起了民愤

translation.en: and it's, and was meant to be highly provocative.
translation.zh: 这种行为从古至今都是极具煽动性的

translation.en: There were people in Stonewall who didn't like Peter,
translation.zh: 石墙组织中有人不喜欢彼得

translation.en: and not everybody thought he always acted in the right way,
translation.zh: 不是每个人都赞同他的一举一动

translation.en: but he wasn't really accountable.
translation.zh: 但他也很少出面解释
