translation.en: I think, for people who are intensely homophobic,
translation.zh: 对于极度恐同的人而言

translation.en: I've come to personify everything they loathe and fear about homosexuality.
translation.zh: 我已经成为他们憎同和恐同的代表人物

translation.en: I get bricks through the window,
translation.zh: 我的窗户经常遭人砸砖块

translation.en: bullets through the door, arson attempts on my home.
translation.zh: 前门布满弹孔有人企图纵火烧毁我的房子

translation.en: If I had to dwell on these attacks,
translation.zh: 如果我对这些袭击事件耿耿于怀 整天为这些事烦恼 我搞不好会疯掉

translation.en: if I thought about them, I'd probably go mad,
translation.zh: 整天为这些事烦恼 我搞不好会疯掉

translation.en: I'd probably commit suicide.
translation.zh: 搞不好会自杀

translation.en: Hi, there. Fine, thank you.
translation.zh: 嗨 好的 谢谢你

translation.en: I think I'm quite difficult to live with
translation.zh: 我觉得自己是个很难相处的人

translation.en: because the pressure of my work is so relentless.
translation.zh: 毕竟经常日以继夜地工作

translation.en: Are you in central London at all on Monday?
translation.zh: 你星期一会不会待在伦敦市中心？

translation.en: I work ridiculous hours.
translation.zh: 忙得不可开交

translation.en: It's not uncommon for me to work a 16-hour day.
translation.zh: 每天工作16个小时是平常事

translation.en: Half-past nine in the morning, oh!
translation.zh: 早上9点30分

translation.en: I hardly have time to eat or sleep.
translation.zh: 连用餐睡觉的事件也没有

translation.en: - Do you not miss having someone special in your life?
translation.zh: 难道你不希望生命中有个特别的人吗？

translation.en: - I've had five wonderful relationships in my life,
translation.zh: 我这一生经历过五段美好的恋情

translation.en: which is more than a lot of people.
translation.zh: 感情经历比多数人丰富

translation.en: I feel quite content. I'm single now.
translation.zh: 我感到十分满足 我目前单身

translation.en: Maybe I'll have another relationship in the future, who knows?
translation.zh: 也许未来还会有一段恋爱谁知道呢？

translation.en: Yeah, 'cause basically I need about seven copies
translation.zh: 是的 其实我需要七份拷贝

translation.en: for all the major media outlets like BBC, ITN, Channel 4, Sky.
translation.zh: 发送给英国广播公司、独立电视新闻第四频道、天空公司等主要媒体

translation.en: There was one public episode in your life
translation.zh: 那个时候 你的人生发生了一件大事

translation.en: which proved rather popular for people who'd been your critics up to that point,
translation.zh: 成为你的批评者津津乐道的话题

translation.en: the attempted citizen's arrest of Robert Mugabe.
translation.zh: 也就是你企图以公民身份逮捕罗伯特穆加贝

translation.en: Zimbabwean human rights defenders
translation.zh: 津巴布韦人权捍卫组织

translation.en: asked if I would try and do something to raise
translation.zh: 问我愿不愿意采取行动

translation.en: international awareness about the abuses of the Mugabe regime.
translation.zh: 提升全球对穆加贝滥用政权的醒觉

translation.en: I hit on the idea of using the power of citizen's arrest
translation.zh: 我想到动用公民逮捕权利

translation.en: to try and get Mugabe put on trial for torture.
translation.zh: 企图以滥用酷刑罪将穆加贝绳之于法

translation.en: - Stop him, he's under arrest! - He's under arrest!
translation.zh: -拦住他 他被逮捕了！-他被逮捕了！

translation.en: - Arrest him!
translation.zh: 快逮捕他！

translation.en: The guy in the car! Arrest him!
translation.zh: 那个人就坐在车里 赶紧逮捕他！

translation.en: [Stephen] Peter is a performance artist with his politics to some extent.
translation.zh: 在政治上 他某种程度上是个演员

translation.en: He knows how to stage these things, and he knows perfectly
translation.zh: 他知道怎么铺陈整个事发经过 他非常清楚警察无法用手铐铐住他

translation.en: well that he's not going to be able to put handcuffs on him
translation.zh: 他非常清楚警察无法用手铐铐住他

translation.en: and take him to a court of law in The Hague or anywhere else.
translation.zh: 把他送进海牙国际法院什么的

translation.en: Arrest the torturer! No! Arrest him! Arrest the torturer!
translation.zh: 逮捕那个暴君 别拦住我！赶紧抓住那个暴君！

translation.en: You are under arrest.
translation.zh: 逮捕那个暴君 别拦住我！赶紧抓住那个暴君！ 你被逮捕了

translation.en: [Adrian] There's a lot of adrenaline flowing.
translation.zh: 令人肾上腺素飙升

translation.en: You can see beforehand he's sort of psyching himself up.
translation.zh: 看得出他事先已经做好心理准备

translation.en: You can see him going through the process. He's got all the arguments in his head.
translation.zh: 看得出他都想好了他已经知道怎么辩论了

translation.en: I've asked you, officer, to arrest President Mugabe
translation.zh: 警官 我恳求你以1998年刑事司法法第134条

translation.en: under Section 134 of the Criminal Justice Act 1988.
translation.zh: 警官 我恳求你以1998年刑事司法法第134条 将穆加贝总统逮捕归案

translation.en: Peter knows how to get the lighting director
translation.zh: 彼得知道怎么引导灯光师

translation.en: to point the spotlight at the place he wants it pointed,
translation.zh: 将聚光灯集中在他要的地方

translation.en: and that's a great skill.
translation.zh: 这个手法厉害

translation.en: I'm trying to prevent torture.
translation.zh: 我在极力阻止有人滥用酷刑

translation.en: I am trying to ensure the arrest of a torturer, Robert Mugabe.
translation.zh: 我要确保暴君罗伯特穆加贝被逮捕归案

translation.en: I thought the attempt to arrest Mugabe on human rights charges
translation.zh: 我认为企图以侵犯人权罪逮捕穆加贝

translation.en: would help shine a spotlight on the human rights abuses of his regime.
translation.zh: 有助于将聚光灯放在穆加贝政府侵犯人权的行为

translation.en: Open the gate!
translation.zh: 快开门！

translation.en: But he can be pretty difficult. He can be a bit of a nightmare, actually.
translation.zh: 但他这个人很难缠其实有点像噩梦般的存在

translation.en: It's tough, doing that kind of stuff. It takes a lot of energy to do that.
translation.zh: 做这种事不容易 需要很多精力

translation.en: I've come to see Tim Land.
translation.zh: 我来见蒂姆兰姆

translation.en: I would be grateful if you would leave the building.
translation.zh: 谨请你离开这座大楼

translation.en: How many millions of people have to die in Zimbabwe
translation.zh: 津巴布韦要死多少人

translation.en: before you decide not to play cricket?
translation.zh: 你才会决定不去打板球？

translation.en: You know, is it 10,000? 100,000? 1 million? 5 million?
translation.zh: 一万人？十万人？一百万人？还是五百万人？

translation.en: Would 5 million deaths be enough?
translation.zh: 死五百万人够吗？

translation.en: Listen. There are other issues. [Peter] Bring me to the president.
translation.zh: -听好 还有其他议题-带我去见津巴布韦总统

translation.en: Would someone help me, for God's sake?
translation.zh: 谁可以来帮助我们？当是为了上帝

translation.en: And the media is a safeguard. I mean, it always has been.
translation.zh: 媒体一直是异见人士的安全网

translation.en: In all the damage I've ever covered, Peter or otherwise,
translation.zh: 媒体一直是异见人士的安全网 在我报导过的暴动事件中

translation.en: if the media's not there, then people will get beaten up.
translation.zh: 只要没有媒体在场 就有人会被殴打

translation.en: Peter Tatchell lurked in the lobby of a hotel
translation.zh: 彼得塔切尔在酒店大厅埋伏

translation.en: to ambush Mr Mugabe as he emerged from lunch.
translation.zh: 突袭刚结束午宴的穆加贝总统

translation.en: President Mugabe.
translation.zh: 穆加贝总统

translation.zh: 我以《联合国禁止酷刑公约》指控滥用酷刑 并将你逮捕归案

translation.en: Under international law,
translation.zh: 按照国际法令

translation.zh: -你替谁做事？-你问我替谁做事？

translation.zh: -你刚才打了他-没有！

translation.en: [Woman] Don't touch him.

translation.zh: 谁能拦住这辆车避免他们开车碾过他？

translation.en: I thought, even from the early days, that Peter was a brave motherfucker,
translation.zh: 起初我觉得彼得是个勇敢的狗杂种

translation.en: but when I saw him being beaten up by Robert Mugabe's thugs
translation.zh: 可是当我在黄金时段在国家电视台的新闻上

translation.en: on prime-time national television,
translation.zh: 可是当我在黄金时段在国家电视台的新闻上 看到他被穆加贝的流氓手下暴打后

translation.en: I thought, "He's a really brave motherfucker."
translation.zh: 我心想：“他的确是个勇敢的狗杂种”

translation.zh: 从那一刻起

translation.zh: 彼得从一个万人黑

translation.en: and became a national treasure.
translation.zh: 摇身变成国宝

translation.en: Welcome him now, he's Peter Tatchell.
translation.zh: 马上有请彼得塔切尔

translation.zh: -彼得 欢迎你上节目-早安 彼得

translation.zh: 一起来看看你近来对抗政权的精彩片段

translation.en: I'm putting you under arrest on charges of torture...
translation.zh: 我以滥用酷刑罪将你逮捕归案

translation.zh: 我以滥用酷刑罪将你逮捕归案 企图逮捕穆加贝事件让我意识到

translation.en: I could take on very powerful and quite threatening people.
translation.zh: 我敢对付位高权重、威胁性高的人

translation.zh: 白人 滚过来

translation.zh: 臭白人小子 过来当面跟我说啊让我狠狠地操你

translation.zh: 你这个娘炮

translation.zh: 彼得和迈克泰森有一场精彩的对手戏

translation.zh: 娘炮 我会操得你爱上我

translation.zh: 跟这种人对峙再次说明了彼得的出色之处

translation.zh: 我走到泰森面前

translation.zh: 跟他说：“你能不能发表反对歧视同性恋者的言论？”

translation.en: To my surprise and delight, he was the first
translation.zh: 令我感到惊讶和高兴的是他是第一个发表

translation.en: major straight sport star to ever make such a statement.
translation.zh: 反对歧视同性恋者言论的体育巨星

translation.en: [Stephen] Within Russia,
translation.zh: 在俄罗斯

translation.en: once society legally regards you as on the fringes of the law because of your sexuality,
translation.zh: 一旦某人因性取向而被社会认定为游走在法律边缘的人

translation.en: it means you are vulnerable to all kinds of attack.
translation.zh: 意味着这个人很容易遭遇各种形式的袭击

translation.en: It means blood on the pavements.
translation.zh: 走在街上很可能会被殴打

translation.en: They're constantly likely to be beaten up
translation.zh: 俄罗斯性少数群体经常遭到殴打

translation.en: or blackmailed or silenced or fined or imprisoned.
translation.zh: 勒索、压迫、罚款或监禁

translation.en: In 2007, I was asked by Russian LGBT+ activists
translation.zh: 2007年 我受到俄罗斯性少数群体社运人士邀请

translation.en: to go to Moscow to support their efforts to hold a gay pride parade,
translation.zh: 前往莫斯科举办同性恋骄傲大游行

translation.en: which is lawful under the Russian Constitution,
translation.zh: 在俄罗斯宪法下举办同性恋游行是合法的 只是后来莫斯科市长颁布了禁令

translation.en: but was banned by the then mayor of Moscow.
translation.zh: 只是后来莫斯科市长颁布了禁令

translation.en: So, I went there to stand in solidarity
translation.zh: 于是我前往俄罗斯跟这些勇敢无畏的社运人士

translation.en: with these incredibly brave Russian activists.
translation.zh: 于是我前往俄罗斯跟这些勇敢无畏的社运人士 站在同一阵线上

translation.en: The gay rights activist Peter Tatchell
translation.zh: 同性恋平权社运人士彼得塔切尔

translation.en: and Right Said Fred singer Richard Fairbrass have been
translation.zh: 以及弗瑞德语录乐队歌手弗莱德费斯布拉斯

translation.en: attacked while they were taking part in a march in Moscow.
translation.zh: 在莫斯科参加游行时遇袭

translation.en: We were absolutely right to stage a short, peaceful protest,
translation.zh: 举办一场简短、和平的抗议游行绝对没有违法

translation.en: and that's all we intended to do.
translation.zh: 我们没有其他意图

translation.en: We'd literally been here two minutes.
translation.zh: 我们站在这里不过两分钟

translation.en: I was targeted by neo-Nazis
translation.zh: 我被跟警方暗中勾结的新纳粹主义者

translation.en: with police collusion,
translation.zh: 视为攻击目标

translation.en: and very badly beaten.
translation.zh: 被严重打伤

translation.en: Were you hurt as a result?
translation.zh: 这些伤势有没有带来什么后果？

translation.en: As a result of the many physical assaults I've endured,
translation.zh: 遭受严重的肢体伤害后

translation.en: I've been left with semi-permanent brain and eye injuries.
translation.zh: 我被诊断出中度脑损伤和眼伤

translation.en: It's damaged my concentration, memory,
translation.zh: 影响了我的集中力、记忆力

translation.en: balance and coordination.
translation.zh: 平衡力和肢体协调能力

translation.en: It doesn't stop me but I am slower and it's more difficult.
translation.zh: 但这些伤害并不足以成为我的阻碍只是我的行动力比较缓慢和困难了

translation.en: I used to be a really good typist,
translation.zh: 我以前打字快狠准

translation.en: but now I find, really, it's a real struggle to type.
translation.zh: 如今打字成了问题

translation.en: I get the letters jumbled up a lot.
translation.zh: 经常打得乱七八糟

translation.en: But, you know, by comparison to human rights defenders
translation.zh: 但是相较于伊朗和沙地阿拉伯的人权社运人士

translation.en: in Iran or Saudi Arabia, I've got off lightly.
translation.zh: 我受到的伤害算轻了

translation.en: You know, I haven't been imprisoned, I haven't been tortured, I'm not dead,
translation.zh: 我未曾被监禁和折磨过 人也还活着

translation.en: so I count my blessings and think, well, carry on the fight.
translation.zh: 所以我十分感恩心想：“继续奋斗下去吧”

translation.en: This one is Stephen Fry and me, the actor Stephen Fry.
translation.zh: 这是我和演员斯蒂芬弗雷

translation.en: Protesting in 2013 when the Russians introduced
translation.zh: 在2013年上街抗议俄罗斯政府

translation.en: a new anti-gay law
translation.zh: 提出一项反同性恋法令

translation.en: to criminalise what they call the propaganda of non-traditional sexual relations,
translation.zh: 将这种对非自然法性行为的“宣传”行为判定为违法

translation.en: in other words homosexuality.
translation.zh: 换句话说 就是反同性恋

translation.en: Lots of teachers have been sacked from their jobs,
translation.zh: 许多老师被解雇

translation.en: which is obviously upsetting.
translation.zh: 许多老师被解雇 非常荒谬

translation.en: Well, you don't know whether they're, sort of, preaching their...
translation.zh: 毕竟我们不知道他们有没有宣扬…

translation.en: What do you mean preaching?
translation.zh: “宣扬”是什么意思？

translation.en: You know, they'd say, "It's alright to be gay," you know?
translation.zh: 你也懂的 他们会宣称：“是同性恋没关系”

translation.en: What's wrong with saying that?
translation.zh: 这么说有什么错？

translation.en: Lots of young kids will be gay and lesbians,
translation.zh: 很多小孩长大后会成为同性恋者

translation.en: so they should be saying to kids it's OK to be gay.
translation.zh: 老师应该对孩子们说：“是同性恋没关系

translation.en: Don't be upset or depressed or suicidal.
translation.zh: 不要因此感到难过、压抑甚至想自杀”

translation.en: Yeah, but not coming from a teacher,
translation.zh: 没错 但是老师不能这么说

translation.en: I don't think it's right, but anyway.
translation.zh: 我认为这么做不对

translation.en: Well, isn't a teacher supposed to prepare young people for adult life?
translation.zh: 老师的责任不是预备年轻人面对大人的世界吗？

translation.en: Mardi, your son is very vociferous when it comes to gay rights and things.
translation.zh: 玛蒂 你儿子是个非常张扬的同性恋平权社运人士

translation.en: Would you prefer that he was less so?
translation.zh: 你会不会希望他不是？

translation.en: Well, in honesty, I would say yes.
translation.zh: 说实话 是的

translation.en: It's really a very difficult life for a homosexual,
translation.zh: 毕竟同性恋者的人生太苦了

translation.en: and I think he's suffered so much,
translation.zh: 我觉得他受了很多苦

translation.en: and his life would be less stressful.
translation.zh: 如果他不是同性恋者那他就不必承受这么大的压力

translation.en: [Peter] So, we're going out for a day's outing. Where are we off to, Heather?
translation.zh: 我们来个一日游海瑟 知道我们要去哪里吗？

translation.en: Copperlode Dam.
translation.zh: 考珀劳德大坝

translation.en: - You ever been there? - No.
translation.zh: -你去过吗？-没去过

translation.en: What about you, Mum?
translation.zh: 妈 你去过吗？

translation.en: No, I've never been there, I'd love to go. Yes, we're going.
translation.zh: -没去过 很想去一趟-太好了 那就是我们的目的地

translation.en: My stepfather was a pretty old-fashioned patriarchal authoritarian.
translation.zh: 我的继父是个非常保守的父权主义者

translation.en: This is Edwin, is that his name? Edwin, yeah.
translation.zh: -他叫埃德温 对吧？-没错 他叫埃德温

translation.en: He was physically violent towards me.
translation.zh: 我小的时候 他经常对我使用暴力

translation.en: He'd fly into a rage, and go physically berserk.
translation.zh: 他会大发雷霆 对我拳打脚踢

translation.en: I can remember times when he gave me the strap,
translation.zh: 我还记得他抄起腰带毒打我的情景

translation.en: and the red welt marks would swell up and last for days.
translation.zh: 皮肤上凸起的鞭痕要持续好几天才会消失

translation.en: Another time in a rage,
translation.zh: 皮肤上凸起的鞭痕要持续好几天才会消失 有一次他盛怒之下

translation.en: he broke a leg off a dining room chair to beat me with.
translation.zh: 折断饭厅里的椅子 对我一阵毒打

translation.en: He swung at me with an axe.
translation.zh: 有一次他对着我挥动斧头

translation.en: If I hadn't ducked, he probably would've hit me in the head.
translation.zh: 要是我来不及闪开可能已经劈中我的脑袋了

translation.en: I was really upset about the way that he treated Peter, yes.
translation.zh: 我对他对待彼得的方式感到非常愤怒

translation.en: He was a very aggressive man, and very...
translation.zh: 他是个脾气非常暴躁的人 也非常…

translation.en: Oh, he was brutal at times, really.
translation.zh: 有时候非常残暴

translation.en: [Heather] I was very scared of my father.
translation.zh: 我小的时候非常害怕我爸

translation.en: I can remember Peter getting many, many, many bashings,
translation.zh: 我小的时候非常害怕我爸 我记得彼得承受过多次毒打

translation.en: far worse than he would let on.
translation.zh: 伤势比他所说的还要严重

translation.en: And your mother didn't intervene or...?
translation.zh: 你妈妈当时没出出面阻止吗？

translation.en: There were several occasions
translation.zh: 有好几次

translation.en: when my stepfather was so violent and threatening
translation.zh: 继父表现得非常暴力和危险

translation.en: that my mother had to call the police.
translation.zh: 妈妈只好打电话报警

translation.en: They came and repeatedly warned him that he would be arrested.
translation.zh: 警察来了 不断地警告他如果再犯 就会被逮捕

translation.en: In the end, he always calmed down
translation.zh: 警察来了 不断地警告他如果再犯 就会被逮捕 警察来到之后

translation.en: in front of the police, and got away with it.
translation.zh: 他总是能冷静下来 逃过一劫

translation.en: It was so bad that I often said to my mother, you know, "Can't we leave?"
translation.zh: 我们的处境非常糟糕我经常问妈妈：“可以离开这里吗？”

translation.en: [Heather] I still, to this day, carry scars from how he treated my brothers.
translation.zh: 直到今天 我身上还带着目睹我爸虐待哥哥的心灵创伤

translation.en: It was a terrible time,
translation.zh: 那是一段非常黑暗的童年

translation.en: and I don't know why Peter's such a good person
translation.zh: 我不理解彼得后来怎么会变成一个这么善良的人

translation.en: because he could've quite easily gone the other way.
translation.zh: 毕竟以他的过去他很容易就变成另一种人

translation.en: The experience of abuse from my stepfather
translation.zh: 遭到继父虐待的经历

translation.en: made me inclined to stand up to bullies,
translation.zh: 让我更勇于奋起对抗霸凌者

translation.en: to take on tyrants, to challenge people who are doing bad things.
translation.zh: 对付暴君、挑战做坏事的人

translation.en: [Newsreader] Vladimir Putin has signed a decree
translation.zh: 弗拉基米尔普京刚签署了一项禁令

translation.en: banning so-called homosexual propaganda in Russia,
translation.zh: 禁止人们在俄罗斯境内宣扬同性恋

translation.en: which effectively bans gay rights rallies, and could be
translation.zh: 这条禁令将有效禁止同性恋平权游行

translation.en: used to prosecute anyone voicing support for homosexuals.
translation.zh: 也可被引用来起诉任何为同性恋者发声的人

translation.en: [Stephen] Russia, so violently homophobic,
translation.zh: 俄罗斯恐同情绪高涨

translation.en: and the example of Chechnya, which is like a sort of bubble inside Russia, I mean,
translation.zh: 以在俄罗斯政府管辖下的车臣为例

translation.en: that is just unspeakable what's going on there.
translation.zh: 该国所发生的反同事件真是一言难尽

translation.en: [Newsreader] Here in Chechnya, Ramzan Kadyrov,
translation.zh: 车臣共和国总统拉姆赞卡德罗夫的守卫

translation.en: whose security forces are accused of abduction and torture.
translation.zh: 被控绑架同性恋者 对他们滥用酷刑

translation.en: Really, really awful levels of homophobia,
translation.zh: 恐同程度令人乍舌

translation.en: and murder of gay people.
translation.zh: 甚至杀害同性恋者

translation.en: [Translation] Here, a man is a man,
translation.zh: 在这里 男人就是男人

translation.en: a woman is a woman, an animal is an animal and a dog is a dog.
translation.zh: 女人就是女人动物就是动物 狗就是狗

translation.en: [Newsreader] The Russian prime minister, Vladimir Putin,
translation.zh: 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔普京

translation.en: has thanked soccer's world governing body, FIFA,
translation.zh: 感谢国际足球联合会

translation.en: for choosing his country to host the 2018 World Cup.
translation.zh: 选择让俄罗斯主办2018年世界杯

translation.en: Angry fighters like Peter
translation.zh: 这个时候最需要像彼得这种愤怒的战士

translation.en: are as needed now as they ever have been.
translation.zh: 这个时候最需要像彼得这种愤怒的战士 这有违俄罗斯联邦宪法

translation.en: We are honoured to be in this tough and fair fight.
translation.zh: 能参与这场艰难且公平的争斗我们感到十分荣幸

translation.en: [Peter] With the World Cup in June,
translation.zh: 世界杯6月掀开序幕

translation.en: what can we do to help support the Russian activists?
translation.zh: 我们能做些什么来支持俄罗斯的社运人士？

translation.en: Could I go there and do some kind of protest
translation.zh: 我能不能到俄罗斯进行某种形式的抗议行动

translation.en: to draw attention to what's happening in Russia?
translation.zh: 以引起人们关注俄罗斯的情景？

translation.en: We have Peter going very much into the lion's den.
translation.zh: 彼得要深入虎穴

translation.en: He's off to Moscow to campaign.
translation.zh: 他将前往俄罗斯进行抗议行动

translation.en: So, my job is to get Peter to Moscow,
translation.zh: 我的任务是确保彼得入境莫斯科

translation.en: and to do everything that I can to keep him safe.
translation.zh: 并竭尽所能地保障他的安全

translation.en: Kind of want him back, as well, in one piece.
translation.zh: 我希望他能平安回来

translation.en: Let's just go over safety.
translation.zh: 我们再复习一遍安全准则

translation.en: The mobiles of all of us are in an emergency WhatsApp group.
translation.zh: 我们手机里都有一个紧急Whatsapp群组

translation.en: Obviously, that's encrypted, including your emergency mobile.
translation.zh: 当然已经被加密了包括你的紧急手机

translation.en: Could I just caution about contacting any of these Russian groups,
translation.zh: 联系俄罗斯社运团体时我需要谨慎吗？

translation.en: 'cause they're gonna almost certainly be under surveillance
translation.zh: 我敢相信他们肯定受到俄罗斯联邦安全局某种程度的监控

translation.en: by the Russian security services so you make contact with them,
translation.zh: 我敢相信他们肯定受到俄罗斯联邦安全局某种程度的监控 所以你要负责跟他们联系

translation.en: then they know that I'm there and where I am.
translation.zh: 让他们知道我抵达俄罗斯的时间和所在地点

translation.en: There are very few people know that you're going to Russia.
translation.zh: 让他们知道我抵达俄罗斯的时间和所在地点 知道你去俄罗斯的人不多

translation.en: Match tickets in case you have to show immigration.
translation.zh: 赛事门票 过海关时可能要出示

translation.en: [Peter] I'm quite nervous. Russia is not a safe place.
translation.zh: 我感到挺紧张的 毕竟俄罗斯不安全

translation.en: It's a country where homophobia is the norm,
translation.zh: 俄罗斯是个恐同情绪普遍的国家

translation.en: really excessive and often violent homophobia.
translation.zh: 同性恋被视为激进行为恐同暴力是常态

translation.en: There's the dictation button.
translation.zh: 这是听写按键

translation.en: How do I get to the Kremlin?
translation.zh: 要怎么前往克里姆林宫？

translation.en: And then hit the button, that's it, and then go.
translation.zh: 按下去 没错 然后开始说话

translation.en: And then hit the little speaker button next to Russian.
translation.zh: 然后按下这个俄语发音按键 要怎么前往克里姆林宫？

translation.en: Here's my England flag, which is sort of a decoy
translation.zh: 这是我的英国国旗 其实只是掩饰

translation.en: to suggest that I am really a genuine English football fan.
translation.zh: 让人以为我是英国足球队的铁粉

translation.en: This is my rainbow flag for Moscow,
translation.zh: 这是我要带去莫斯科的彩虹旗

translation.en: which I hope to display at some point in Red Square.
translation.zh: 我希望能在红场扬起这面旗帜

translation.en: Although I've done over 3,000 direct actions in my lifetime,
translation.zh: 虽然我一生曾带领超过三千场同性恋平权对峙行动

translation.en: I'm still very, very nervous about this trip.
translation.zh: 但我对这趟行程仍旧感到非常紧张

translation.en: You know, I'm feeling a little bit physically ill, in fact.
translation.zh: 其实我的身体感到有点不舒服

translation.en: [Interviewer] Have you been to see the doctor recently,
translation.zh: 最近有没有去看医生？

translation.en: and do they know that you're going overseas to do a protest?
translation.zh: 他们知不知道你将到国外去参加抗议行动？

translation.en: My doctors have said very clearly,
translation.zh: 医生已经很清楚地说明

translation.en: "No more head injuries, you've had enough."
translation.zh: “脑袋不能再受伤了脑袋承受的损伤够多了”

translation.en: And friends of mine are saying, "This is really, really dangerous.
translation.zh: 我的朋友都对我说：“这么做很危险的”

translation.en: "You could end up dead."
translation.zh: “你很有可能会死掉”

translation.en: In the eyes of the Russian authorities, I am a troublemaker.
translation.zh: 在俄罗斯执法单位眼中我是个制造麻烦的人

translation.en: My past protests in Russia
translation.zh: 我过去在俄罗斯倡导的抗议行动

translation.en: have been very bad PR for the Putin regime.
translation.zh: 给普京政权公关带来极度不良的影响

translation.en: [Peter] With all the world's media shining on Russia,
translation.zh: 如今全球媒体都聚焦在俄罗斯

translation.en: it would be a tragedy if the World Cup passed off
translation.zh: 如果这次错过了通过世界杯的舞台

translation.en: without anyone drawing attention to the human rights abuses
translation.zh: 引起人们对俄罗斯政府践踏性少数群体人权的关注

translation.en: against LGBT people in Russia, and, in particular, in Chechnya.
translation.zh: 尤其是车臣同性恋者迫害惨剧那才会是一场悲剧

translation.en: There's been 15 or 20 countries over the years
translation.zh: 过去多年以来我曾到过15、20个国家

translation.en: that I've managed to evade their security checks.
translation.zh: 过去多年以来我曾到过15、20个国家 并成功避开海关安检

translation.en: What day does Red Square open again? Tomorrow?
translation.zh: 红场下一次开放是什么时候？明天吗？

translation.en: After tomorrow.
translation.zh: 后天

translation.en: After tomorrow? So, they're open on Thursday?
translation.zh: 后天？你是指星期四开放吗？

translation.en: My news release has been sent out to the media,
translation.zh: 我的新闻稿已经发送给媒体

translation.en: calling out FIFA over giving Russia the World Cup,
translation.zh: 内容谴责国际足球联合会批准俄罗斯主办世界杯

translation.en: and Russia over its abuse of LGBT human rights.
translation.zh: 并呼吁人们关注俄罗斯践踏性少数群体人权的行为

translation.en: The one thing all tyrannies fear
translation.zh: 所有专制暴政者都害怕

translation.en: is a media coverage of their human rights abuses.
translation.zh: 媒体报导他们践踏人权

translation.en: Protest has such power because it gets media coverage
translation.zh: 抗议行动力量大 因为获得媒体报导

translation.en: shining a spotlight on persecution.
translation.zh: 让人聚焦在暴政迫害行为上

translation.en: They don't want the message to get out to the wider world about what they're doing to their own people.
translation.zh: 他们不希望他们迫害人民的消息被更广泛地传播开来

translation.en: I'm just so fucking exhausted.
translation.zh: -我累坏了-我知道

translation.en: [Interviewer] I know you are.
translation.zh: -我累坏了-我知道 （莫斯科 世界杯）

translation.en: [Whispering] This is my Brazil football shirt,
translation.zh: （机密消息 塔切尔计划在莫斯科为性少数群体平反） 这是我的巴西队球衣

translation.en: which I'm wearing in order to get through security
translation.zh: 我打算穿着它混过保安检查

translation.en: into the cordoned area around the Kremlin.
translation.zh: 进入克里姆林宫的警戒区内

translation.en: I've got several placards that I could use today,
translation.zh: 我准备了几张今天派上用场的标语牌

translation.en: but these are the two that I think.
translation.zh: 但我认为这两张最合适

translation.en: It's either this one. - Mm-hm.
translation.zh: 要不举起这张 （同性恋平权）

translation.en: Or this one.
translation.zh: 要不举起这张

translation.en: [Reporter] The FIFA World Cup kicks off in Moscow tonight,
translation.zh: 世界杯今晚将在莫斯科掀开序幕

translation.en: with the host nation, Russia, taking on Saudi Arabia.
translation.zh: 首场赛事由东道主俄罗斯队对战沙地阿拉伯队

translation.en: I am a bit concerned that my email and phone
translation.zh: 我有点担心电邮和手机

translation.en: might be monitored by the Russian authorities,
translation.zh: 遭到俄罗斯执法单位监督

translation.en: so I'm heading over to a World Cup fringe event
translation.zh: 所以我跑去参加一项世界杯周边活动

translation.en: to discreetly hand out information
translation.zh: 悄悄将我将有意进行示威运动的消息

translation.en: about my planned protest to the assembled media.
translation.zh: 传递给汇聚当地的媒体

translation.en: - Today? - Yeah, today.
translation.zh: -今天吗？-是的 今天

translation.en: So, if you can come today, that would be brilliant.
translation.zh: 如果你今天能到场 那就再好不过了

translation.en: - So... - Ah!
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: Although I have very strong convictions,
translation.zh: 虽然我意志坚定

translation.en: I've also got quite debilitating self-doubt.
translation.zh: 我对自己也有强烈的质疑

translation.en: There's a fear about failure,
translation.zh: 我害怕失败

translation.en: the worry about arrest and possibly being beaten up.
translation.zh: 担心被逮捕或殴打

translation.en: I've always got an overpowering headache from the nervous tension
translation.zh: 每次准备参加对峙性抗议活动时

translation.en: whenever I'm doing a direct action protest.
translation.zh: 我都会紧张得头痛欲裂

translation.en: My stomach's churning over. I actually feel physically ill.
translation.zh: 我的胃在翻腾 我感到身体不适

translation.en: Get around this way.
translation.zh: 往这边来

translation.en: There can be no normal sporting relation
translation.zh: 在弗拉基米尔普京的暴政下

translation.en: with an abnormal regime like that of Vladimir Putin.
translation.zh: 没有体育精神可言

translation.en: Putin sanctioned the 2013 law...
translation.zh: 普京颁布了2013年反同法令…

translation.en: Oh, sorry, hi.
translation.zh: 不好意思 你好

translation.en: Sorry, Engli, Engli, Engli.
translation.zh: 抱歉 说英语

translation.en: It's a bit too quickly, an action.
translation.zh: 这是违法行为

translation.en: Can I check your documents, thanks?
translation.zh: 介意我检查你的证件吗？

translation.en: President Putin sanctioned
translation.zh: 普京颁布了

translation.en: the 2013 law that has led to the persecution of LGBT Russians.
translation.zh: 2013年反同法令导致俄罗斯性少数群体遭受迫害

translation.en: I asked you to stop.
translation.zh: 我叫你马上停止

translation.en: President Putin has failed to stop the violence,
translation.zh: 普京总统无力阻止车臣反同者

translation.en: anti-gay witch-hunts in Chechnya.
translation.zh: 虐待和逮捕同性恋者

translation.en: I asked you to stop your action.
translation.zh: 我叫你马上停止

translation.en: Even President Putin doesn't have the right to override the Constitution.
translation.zh: 就连普京总统也无权驾临于国家宪法之上

translation.en: I know, but time to...
translation.zh: 我懂 但你是时候…

translation.en: I'm being apprehended?
translation.zh: 我被逮捕了吗？

translation.en: I want to stay here with the journalists, though.
translation.zh: 我想要跟记者待在一起

translation.en: No, no, stop.
translation.zh: 不行 够了

translation.en: I want the Russian government to uphold the Constitution.
translation.zh: 我要促俄罗斯政府遵守宪法

translation.en: Right now, you're breaking Russian law. OK.
translation.zh: -你违反了俄罗斯法律-知道了

translation.en: Detained and charged by Moscow police.
translation.zh: …被莫斯科警方羁押和起诉

translation.en: Holding up a placard highlighting the plight of gay men in Chechnya.
translation.zh: 他举着一张标语牌呼吁关注车臣男同性恋者压迫事件

translation.en: Peter Tatchell didn't feel that he was breaking the law.
translation.zh: 彼得塔切尔不认为他违反法律

translation.en: ..who was detained has been released today.
translation.zh: …被羁押后 今天被释放出来

translation.en: He joins us now.
translation.zh: 他就在现场

translation.en: Under President Putin, there has been a long...
translation.zh: 在普京总统的领导下性少数群体长期…

translation.en: My protest was about the criminalisation of LGBT equality.
translation.zh: 这场抗议行动主要呼吁对反性少数群体平权法律的关注

translation.en: Just as I'd hoped, it stole Putin's thunder.
translation.zh: 正如我所愿此举成功抢走了普京的风头

translation.en: I want the story not to be just about Russia hosting the World Cup.
translation.zh: 我希望媒体不仅报导俄罗斯作为世界杯东道主一事

translation.en: It's put LGBT rights in the headlines around the world.
translation.zh: 而是让性少数群体权益议题登上全球各地的新闻头条

translation.en: [Producer] That was fantastic, Peter. Thank you so much.
translation.zh: 彼得 太棒了 感激不尽

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: - Take care of yourself. - Yeah, thank you.
translation.zh: -保重-谢谢

translation.en: - Bye-bye. - Bye-bye.
translation.zh: -再见-谢谢 再见

translation.en: The fact that somebody wants to fight for us,
translation.zh: 得知有人愿意为我们平反

translation.en: and also to put yourself in danger,
translation.zh: 还以身犯险

translation.en: we need that help, we need to raise awareness.
translation.zh: 我们需要这种帮助我们需要提高醒觉

translation.en: It's for you. Thank you.
translation.zh: 这是送给你的 谢谢你

translation.en: An impression people have of you is that you're a one-man band.
translation.zh: 人们对你的印象是 你是个独行侠

translation.en: We're gonna do it as soon as he starts speaking.
translation.zh: 一旦他开始发表演讲我们就要行动了

translation.en: Moves his mouth, yeah.
translation.zh: 一旦他开口 好的

translation.en: All the work I've done over the last five decades
translation.zh: 过去五十年以来 我所做的一切

translation.en: has been collaborative.
translation.zh: 过去五十年以来 我所做的一切 都是大家努力的结果

translation.en: It's never been me alone.
translation.zh: 从来不是我一个人的功劳

translation.en: Protect human rights. Protect human rights in Syria.
translation.zh: “捍卫叙利亚人权”？

translation.en: Too vague, too vague. UK airdrops now.
translation.zh: 太笼统了 要喊：“英国发动空袭”

translation.en: It's gotta be something specific and concrete.
translation.zh: 口号不能太笼统 一定要具体

translation.en: I'm often the front person.
translation.zh: 我向来都站在前线

translation.en: UK airdrops now.
translation.zh: 好的 就用“英国发动空袭”

translation.en: Without the other people supporting and campaigning alongside,
translation.zh: 没有其他人的支持和站在同一阵线上

translation.en: none of these positive changes would've happened.
translation.zh: 根本无法带来这些正面的改变

translation.en: We'd like to ask Jeremy...
translation.zh: 我们要呼吁德国…

translation.en: Peter, I think...
translation.zh: 彼得 我觉得…

translation.en: What's happening in Aleppo is a modern-day Guernica.
translation.zh: 发生在阿勒颇的战事有如现代版的格尔尼卡大轰炸

translation.en: Peter, could we leave these sorts of questions, please?
translation.zh: 彼得 可以等到问答环节再说吗？

translation.en: [Peter] Good morning. Can I give you a leaflet?
translation.zh: 早上好 可以给你一张传单吗？

translation.en: Can I give you a leaflet? Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 早上好 可以给你一张传单吗？十分感谢

translation.en: Do you feel good about yourself?
translation.zh: 你对自己满意吗？

translation.en: I guess I do, at a certain level, feel a sense of self-satisfaction.
translation.zh: 在某种程度上 我感到满足

translation.en: Lay some placards down so people can see the message.
translation.zh: 把一些标语牌摊在地上让路人看到上面的信息

translation.en: What does this LGBT? It means gay people.
translation.zh: -“性少数群体”是什么意思？-就是指同性恋者

translation.en: Why you coming here? Why you don't go to synagogue?
translation.zh: 为什么来这个地方？为什么不去犹太教堂？

translation.en: Go to synagogue. - We do both.
translation.zh: -去犹太教堂吧-我们都去

translation.en: - Or church. - We do both.
translation.zh: -去基督教堂也行-我们都去

translation.en: We're here at Regents Park Mosque today,
translation.zh: 我今天来到了摄政公园清真寺

translation.en: reaching out to our Muslim brothers and sisters.
translation.zh: 向穆斯林弟兄姐妹宣导

translation.en: We want to create dialogue
translation.zh: 我们希望跟他们展开对话

translation.en: so we can live in peace and harmony together for the future.
translation.zh: 携手创造一个安宁、和谐的未来

translation.en: The challenges that the Muslims and LGBT people face are very similar -
translation.zh: 穆斯林和性少数群体所面临的困难非常相似

translation.en: discrimination in the workplace or being the victims of hate crime.
translation.zh: 职场歧视或成为憎恶暴力的受害者

translation.en: We're trying to encourage solidarity between Muslim people and gay people.
translation.zh: 我们企图促进穆斯林和同性恋者之间的团结

translation.en: - When you become homosexual... - Yeah.
translation.zh: -同性恋者…-是的

translation.en: - ..you need to have that fixed. - No, that's not true.
translation.zh: -…需要被纠正-不是的 这说法不对

translation.en: Yes, yes, that's it.
translation.zh: 怎么会不对呢？

translation.en: I've contributed, with others, to so many positive changes.
translation.zh: 我和其他人一起带来了许许多多正面的改变

translation.en: Salaam-alaikum.
translation.zh: 愿你平安

translation.en: I can see so many injustices that need fighting.
translation.zh: 我看到许多有待抗争的不义之事

translation.en: There are certain sins, do you understand?
translation.zh: 这绝对是罪 懂吗？

translation.en: There's nothing explicitly in the Quran that says homosexuality is wrong.
translation.zh: 《可兰经》从未明确指出同性恋是不对的

translation.en: There's no punishments in the Quran.
translation.zh: 也没提到同性恋者将受到惩罚

translation.en: I'm also the kind of person that never feels satisfied.
translation.zh: 我也是个永远无法满足的人

translation.en: When I have a victory, I don't dwell on it very much.
translation.zh: 每次取得胜利后我都不会沉浸在胜利中太久

translation.en: I just think - what's next?
translation.zh: 我会心想：“下一步是什么？”

translation.en: Looking back over my life, I feel satisfaction
translation.zh: 蓦然回首 这一生 我感到很满足

translation.en: that, together with others, we've shown
translation.zh: 因为我和其他人一起 让人们意识到

translation.en: that you don't have to accept the way things are.
translation.zh: 我们没必要凡事逆来顺受

translation.en: You have led us through this...
translation.zh: 你带领我们熬过…

translation.en: No, I have not led you, I have supported you. I have supported you.
translation.zh: 不是我带领你们 我只是支持你们

translation.en: I love other people.
translation.zh: 我热爱其他人

translation.en: I love freedom, equality and justice, and that's what drives me forward.
translation.zh: 我热爱自由、平权和公义这些都是推动我前进的力量

translation.en: I don't like to see people suffering.
translation.zh: 看到别人受苦 我会难受

translation.en: It's very unusual in a political lifetime
translation.zh: （穆加贝是暴君 逮捕穆加贝） 在政治演变历史上

translation.en: to have one figure symbolising a cause,
translation.zh: 出现如此一个活跃了这么久的标志性人物

translation.en: and being active over such a long period of time.
translation.zh: 是非常少见的现象

translation.en: There's no doubting his passion, his sincerity, his devotion,
translation.zh: 他的热忱、诚恳和奉献是毋庸置疑的

translation.en: but, above all, his courage.
translation.zh: 但最重要的是 他有勇气

translation.en: History will judge Peter Tatchell
translation.zh: 史书上会记载彼得塔切尔

translation.en: as one of the most interesting, brave, passionate
translation.zh: 是个最有故事、最勇敢、最热忱

translation.en: and effective campaigners.
translation.zh: 效率最高的社运人士

translation.en: He still holds out a vision of liberation
translation.zh: 他至今仍然怀抱着

translation.en: for all people.
translation.zh: 解放所有人的愿景

translation.en: He's identifying injustices around the world,
translation.zh: 他找出世界各地不公义的现象

translation.en: and going and highlighting them.
translation.zh: 然后站出来呼吁世人关注

translation.en: With your track record, you've been proved right again and again and again,
translation.zh: 你的成功记录一而再 再而三地证明你是对的

translation.en: and the world has caught up with you.
translation.zh: 这个世界也终于与你接轨了

translation.en: Our next guest is a notorious pulpit crasher and gay rights activist.
translation.zh: 下一位嘉宾是臭名在外的讲坛破坏王兼同性恋平权社运人士

translation.en: Please welcome 120 pounds of pink fury,
translation.zh: 有请体重只有55公斤的“粉红战士”

translation.en: Peter Tatchell, ladies and gentlemen.
translation.zh: 各位先生女士 他是彼得塔切尔

translation.en: In the Bible, it's OK to sell your daughter into slavery.
translation.zh: 在《圣经》里 卖女儿为奴是对的

translation.en: You don't hear any advice from the Pope or the Archbishop of Canterbury about how much... what the going price is.
translation.zh: 教宗和坎特伯雷大主教不会告诉我们叫价多少

translation.en: My assessment of Peter now
translation.zh: 我目前对彼得的想法是

translation.en: is that he's been a figure for good and equality.
translation.zh: 他是象征善良和平权的人物

translation.en: Here is a man with deep conviction.
translation.zh: 拥有坚定的信念

translation.en: He's rocked the boat.
translation.zh: 成功掀起了革命

translation.en: And there's a sense in which there is a parallel to Jesus Christ.
translation.zh: 这点跟耶稣基督相似

translation.en: Jesus was prepared to stand up against
translation.zh: 耶稣随时准备好站出来

translation.en: the powerful people in society, represent the smaller people.
translation.zh: 对抗社会强权 为边缘群体发声

translation.en: Where some of us might still question his tactics, no-one
translation.zh: 有人可能会质疑他的手段

translation.en: can actually doubt that he's on the right side of history.
translation.zh: 但没有人可以质疑他的确站在历史正确的一方

translation.en: Makes you feel so humbled to think that Peter's so well regarded.
translation.zh: 彼得深受敬仰 让我感到十分欣慰

translation.en: My mother initially could not accept my homosexuality,
translation.zh: 妈妈起初无法接受我的同性恋取向

translation.en: but she began to accept that I was motivated
translation.zh: 可是她开始相信我的动力

translation.en: by the kinds of moral principles that underpin Christianity.
translation.zh: 乃是按照基督教的道德原则

translation.en: I've shown him how to be compassionate towards people,
translation.zh: 我教会了他怎么仁慈待人

translation.en: I think, and to stand up for what he believes in,
translation.zh: 坚持为自己的信念发声

translation.en: and do what he believes is right.
translation.zh: 去做自己相信是正确的事

translation.en: Although she's still uncomfortable with homosexuality,
translation.zh: 虽然她仍旧对同性恋感到抗拒

translation.en: she doesn't see it as a great terrible sin.
translation.zh: 但她不认为同性恋是大罪

translation.en: It's a minor sin.
translation.zh: 她认为是小罪

translation.en: How would you feel one day if she called you up and said,
translation.zh: 如果将来某天她跟你说

translation.en: "Peter, I've been wrong all these years"?
translation.zh: “彼得 这些年来 我都错了”你会有什么感受？

translation.en: It isn't gonna happen. It's not gonna happen? Alright.
translation.zh: -那是不可能的-不可能？好吧

translation.en: I just say to myself, "Peter's happy, and I love him,
translation.zh: 我经常对自己说：“彼得很快乐 我爱他

translation.en: "and, if he's happy, then I am, too, "doing what you want to do, yes."
translation.zh: 只要他快乐 我也快乐去做你想做的事吧 真的”

translation.en: Thank you, Mum.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 妈妈

translation.en: [Newsreader] Soccer's world governing body, FIFA,
translation.zh: 足球界权威国际足球联合会

translation.en: has chosen Qatar to stage the tournament in 2022.
translation.zh: 选择在卡塔尔举办2022年世界杯

translation.en: It's the first time the World Cup will be played in the Arab world.
translation.zh: 这是阿拉伯世界第一次主办世界杯赛事

translation.en: [Peter] Qatar has a very poor record on LGBT human rights.
translation.zh: 从过去至今卡塔尔无视性少数群体的人权

translation.en: My plan is to work with Qatari dissidents to help shine a spotlight
translation.zh: 我计划与卡塔尔异见人士合作帮助世人把焦点放在

translation.en: on the human rights abuses in their country.
translation.zh: 卡塔尔践踏人权事件上

translation.en: [Elton John] ♪ I believe in love ♪
translation.zh: （性少数群体未得解放非洲人就仍未得解放）

translation.en: ♪ It's all we got ♪
translation.zh: （同性恋歧视是全球现象全球性少数群体平权）

translation.en: ♪ Love has no boundaries ♪
translation.zh: （同性恋歧视是全球现象全球性少数群体平权） （杜绝战争 而非缩减就业机会健康保障和教育）

translation.en: ♪ Costs nothing to touch ♪
translation.zh: （促内政部勿再监禁寻找庇护的同性恋者）

translation.en: ♪ War makes money cancer sleeps ♪
translation.zh: （沙地阿拉伯侵犯巴林不欢迎沙地王室成员） （促联合国调查俾路支暴政和凶杀事件）

translation.en: ♪ Curled up in my father and that means something to me ♪
translation.zh: （同性恋不是选择但恐同是一种选择） （切尔西曼宁：我们酷儿是揭发真相的英雄）

translation.en: ♪ Churches and dictators
translation.zh: （切尔西曼宁：我们酷儿是揭发真相的英雄） （终止异性民事伴侣关系禁令）

translation.en: ♪ Politics and papers ♪
translation.zh: （英联邦与恐同者同流合污真可耻）

translation.en: ♪ Everything crumbles
translation.zh: （与埃及性少数群体同行）

translation.en: ♪ Sooner or later ♪
translation.zh: （爱护穆斯林 憎恶宗教暴行）

translation.en: ♪ But love ♪
translation.zh: （以色列 哈马斯恐怖组织停止残杀无辜百姓） （解放巴勒斯坦）

translation.en: ♪ I believe in love ♪
translation.zh: （停止阿拉伯国家对伊朗的种族清洗政策）

translation.en: ♪ I believe in love it's all we got ♪
translation.zh: （库尔德人是对抗伊斯兰法西斯主义的英雄） （性少数群体和穆斯林站在同一阵线团结对抗仇恨情绪）

translation.en: ♪ Love has no boundaries no borders to cross ♪
translation.zh: （性少数群体和穆斯林站在同一阵线团结对抗仇恨情绪） （罗伯特穆加贝是“暴政女王”）

translation.en: ♪ Love is simple ♪
translation.zh: （北爱尔兰 撤除同性婚姻禁令）

translation.en: ♪ Hate breeds ♪
translation.zh: （尼日利亚反同法令有违宪法和《非洲宪章议定书》）

translation.en: ♪ Those who think difference is the child of disease ♪
translation.zh: （我们追求政治民主何不追求经济民主？）

translation.en: ♪ Father and son make love and guns ♪
translation.zh: （与奥兰多性少数群体同行对抗所有仇恨情绪） （英国 停止攻击以色列）

translation.en: ♪ Families together kill someone ♪
translation.zh: （英国 停止攻击以色列） （军队 滚出去）

translation.en: ♪ Without love ♪
translation.zh: （军队 滚出去） （教宗本笃十六世 绰号“贝蒂”是“恐同女王”）

translation.en: ♪ I believe in love ♪
translation.zh: （与车臣和俄罗斯性少数群体同行）
